urnnewsmlreuters.com20180115nL3S1PA19G1,"
债涌股资金不绝，息爆上隐患懒理/ 习广思
美国上周五公布去年12月的零售销货值上升0.4%，消费物价指数则按月升0.1%，加上金融股业绩后股价造好，道指又破顶急升逾200点。美股升浪似无止境，也带动了中国内地及香港股市屡破连升纪录，这种不寻常的股市升势，讲到尾都是钱作怪，资金流出债市流入股市，顺住个势炒爆为止。
为美股财报季绩打头炮的3家华尔街银行，贝莱德与摩根大通的股价分别涨3.3%与1.6%，富国银行则下跌0.7%，由于无坏消息，其他金融股股价普遍向上。摩通去年第四季净利润骤减37%，调整后每股盈利1.76美元，高于分析师原本估计的1.69美元。
贝莱德去年第四季经调整后每股盈利6.24美元，优于分析师估计的5.98美元；收入34.7亿美元，也高于市场预估的33.1亿美元；美国税改带动去年股市急升，其ETF收入推动期内纯利大增12亿美元。三大银行只有富国银行的股价下跌，主要是收入不及预期。
金融股业绩短期受累税改，长远则受惠减税，再者金融市场兴旺令交易收入增加、缓慢加息令息差有序扩阔，金融股因此有望成为市场宠儿，不少基金经理都在等待这几天的银行股业绩，博业绩失望捞底。可是事与愿违，市场见业绩公布股价唔跌，就更积极买上。
踏入2018年，美国联储局开始减慢买债，欧央行也明确表示经济正在扩张，减QE收水步伐只会加快不会减慢，三大央行就连日本央行也早早缩减买债了。当全球央行都加紧收水，支持股市屡创新高的资金从何而来？
数据显示，本月3日至10日，流入股票基金的资金高达244亿美元，创下逾6个月以来最高水平，也是历史上第六高资金流入的一周。其中，流入美国股票的资金约64亿美元，流入日股的资金达32亿美元，流入欧股的资金约22亿美元，流入新兴市场的资金则达43亿美元，是年半以来的最大流入量。
同时，主动基金持续有资金流出，跟踪标普500等市场指数的大部分ETF则吸引大量资金，反映醒目钱投入到正确方向之余，也选择了正确的工具，拣选了收费最便宜的ETF。
2018年头两周，标指累涨4.2%，涨幅创2003年以来同期最大，港股已经连续14天上扬，沪指连续第11个交易日攀升，创1992年以来最长连涨纪录。
全球股市都有资金大举流入，那么资金来自哪里？伴随股市好景的是资金流出国债，不止美债市场，就连欧洲债市亦然，德国10年期债息由上月下旬的0.3%升至上周五曾破0.6%水平，升幅达100%。
大量资金从国债市场涌出，成为了股市资金的一大来源。这个趋势看来仍会持续，三大央行齐齐收水是重要原因，过去几年大量央行资金泵水入债市，强行将债息压低，跟风的债市基金同样加入这个国债升市派对，令年前欧洲主要国债息一度变负息债。现在央行资金只是减慢流入，却会令热钱由债转股，这股力量不容忽视，机构资金不同散户热钱，力度要大得多。
不过，当美债息升到了一个转折点，就会令人对美债信心大跌，真正市场风险会由此而来。高盛预计，未来4年税改将令美国财政赤字每年平均增超过2000亿美元，而且国会可能会批准大量新的支出方案。2018财政年度美国财政净借款按年将翻倍至超过万亿美元。
联储局第三号人物杜德利（William
Dudley）上周表达了对美国财政状况的担忧，高盛也对美国的债务负担发出警告。高盛指出，税改令赤字上升、国会或批准大兴土木的支出方案，以及联储局「缩表」将增加财政部向公众发行的国债数量，未来国债供应将猛增超过100%。
基于以上因素，高盛预期，美国财政净借款将从2017财政年度的4880亿美元，增加至2018财政年度的1.03万亿美元，并且2019财政年度的净借款也将处于类似水平。融资需求料会通过发行更多短期国债和附息债券进行。
金融博客ZeroHedge对此点评称，高盛没有说明的是，一方面，美国国债供应将翻倍；另一方面，联储局打算继续「缩表」、欧洲和日本央行将缩减QE，当愈来愈多的央行开始摆脱债务货币化时，谁会成为这场债务海啸的边际买家。
目前美国国债大买家之一是中国，中国未来买债方向当然不会有正式官方公布，但是透过各级官员发声，却可收到奇效，以对抗特朗普的贸易保护主义。
未来国债步入熊市，且全球通胀预期持续升温，利率必然向上，但这影响或在数月后以至一年后才显现，目前大家都沉醉在股市大派对，炒爆先算。（完）
注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

,Debt stocks continue to fund the interest rate burst on the risk of lazy / learning Guangsi

The United States announced last Friday that the value of retail sales in December last year rose 0.4%. The CPI soared 0.1% MoM. After the financial results improved, the Dow surged sharply by more than 200 points. US stocks rise like endless waves, but also led the mainland and Hong Kong stock market repeatedly rose ascending record, this unusual stock market rally, talking about the tail are misunderstood, the funds flow out of the stock market into the stock market, Shun a potential speculation Burst so far.

Shares of Wall Street Bank, BlackRock and Morgan Shenzhen Capstone Industrial Co.,Ltd.,rose 3.3% and 1.6% respectively, while Wells Fargo dropped 0.7%. As no bad news, other financial Stock prices generally upward. Moton's net profit plunged 37% in the fourth quarter of last year, adjusted earnings per share of $ 1.76, higher than the analyst's original estimate of $ 1.69.

BlackRock fourth-quarter adjusted earnings per share of 6.24 US dollars last month, better than analysts estimated 5.98 US dollars; revenue of 3.47 billion US dollars, also higher than the market forecast of 3.31 billion US dollars; US tax reform boosted the stock market soared last year, Its ETF revenue boosted its net profit by $ 1.2 billion during the period. Only three major banks Wells Fargo shares fell, mainly income is less than expected.

Short-term financial sector performance tax reform, the long-term benefit from tax cuts, and then the financial markets so that trading revenue increased, the slow rate hike order spread widening, financial stocks so is expected to become the darling of the market, many fund managers are waiting Banking stocks these days performance, Bo disappointment disappointing performance. However, contrary to expectations, see the performance of the market share price is not down, more active buy.

Into 2018, the US Federal Reserve started to slow down the debt bondage, the European Central Bank also made it clear that the economy is expanding, reducing the QE income will only accelerate the pace will not slow down, the three central banks even the Bank of Japan also cut short debt. When the global central banks are stepping up their efforts to support the stock market hit a record high capital come from?

Data show that from the 3rd to the 10th of this month, the funds flowing into the equity funds reached as high as 24.4 billion U.S. dollars, setting the highest level in more than six months and the sixth-largest capital inflow in history. Among them, the inflow of funds to the U.S. stock market amounted to about 6.4 billion U.S. dollars, the inflow of Japanese yen into the stock market amounted to 3.2 billion U.S. dollars, the inflow of funds to the European Union amounted to 2.2 billion U.S. dollars and the inflow of SINECERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION reached 4.3 billion U.S. dollars. Maximum inflow.

Meanwhile, active funds continued to have outflows. Most ETFs tracking market indices such as the S & P500 attracted a large amount of capital, reflecting the obvious direction of investing in the right money. They also chose the right tools and selected the cheapest ETFs.

In the first two weeks of 2018, the benchmark index rose 4.2%, the largest gain since 2003, Hong Kong stocks have been rising for 14 consecutive days, the Shanghai Composite Index rose for 11 consecutive trading days, the highest since 1992, the longest continuous record.

Global stock markets have a large inflow of funds, then the money from where? With the good stock market is the outflow of government bonds, not just the US debt market, even the European bond market, the German 10-year debt rose from 0.3% in late last month rose to 0.6% last Friday, an increase of 100%.

A large number of funds poured from the bond market has become a major source of stock market funds. This trend seems to continue, the three central banks to collect water is an important reason, in the past few years a large number of central bank funds pump into the bond market, forcing the debt pressure down, follow the trend of the bond funds also join the bond market, So that years ago, the major European sovereign bond interest-bearing debt was changed. Now the central bank funds only slow down inflows, but it will make hot money from debt to equity, this force can not be ignored, institutional funds, retail money, efforts should be much greater.

However, when the US debt interest rate rose to a turning point, it will make people's confidence in the United States plummeted, the real market risk will come from. Goldman Sachs predicts that the tax reform in the next four years will cause the U.S. fiscal deficit to increase by more than 200 billion U.S. dollars annually on average, and Congress may approve a large number of new spending plans. The fiscal net borrowing in the United States in fiscal year 201 will double to over trillion dollars a year.
Federal Reserve Third Number Dudley (William

Dudley) expressed concerns about the U.S. financial position last week, and Goldman Sachs also warned the U.S. debt burden. Goldman Sachs pointed out that the deficit increase tax reform, parliamentary approval or approval of spending big programs, and the Federal Reserve ""shrink"" will increase the Ministry of Finance issued to the public the number of bonds, the future supply of government bonds will increase by more than 100%.

Based on the above factors, Goldman Sachs expects net US borrowing to increase from $ 488 billion in FY 2017 to $ 1.03 trillion in FY 2018, and net borrowings in FY 2019 will be at similar levels. Financing requirements will be issued through the issuance of more short-term bonds and coupon bonds.

FinancialHealthBlog ZeroHedge commented on this, Goldman Sachs did not say that on the one hand, the supply of US government bonds will double; the other hand, the Fed intends to continue to ""shrink"" the European and Japanese central banks will reduce the QE, more and more When the central bank began to get out of debt monetization, who would become the marginal buyer of the debt tsunami.

At present, one of the big buyers of U.S. treasuries is China. Of course, there will be no official official announcement of China's future bond buying direction. However, officials at all levels may receive miraculous signs of fighting Trump's trade protectionism.

The next national debt into the bear market, and global inflation expectations continue to heat up, the interest rate inevitably upward, but the impact or in a few months or even years after the show, at present we all indulge in the stock market party, the first fried speculation. (Finish)
Note: The above comments are only abstracts and do not represent Reuters' position.

urnnewsmlreuters.com20180115nL3S1PA1941,"
大市未疯狂，买落后红筹/ 林瑞芬
2018年已过了近两个星期，港股升市当中，确有逐步蔓延，扩展宽度的情况，有大时代意味，还未够疯狂，年内可能更疯狂！
滙丰（00005）周内发力抽升，即带动中银香港（02388）及渣打（02888）于周四抽升。
去年落后的中型红筹股，近两周轮流开车了。如早前因加价声起，刺激华润啤酒（00291）股价抽升。落后的红筹也见发力，如去年跌穿供股价的中国建筑（03311），昨曾高见12.5元，已升上供股价。光国（00257）周四股价急升突破11元密集阻力后亦预示开车，昨进一步攀升2%至11.92元收市，大趋势挑战13元。华润燃气（01193）都不客气，股价昨升3.5%，收报25.2元。
中国建筑去年表现认真麻麻，全年下跌6%，跑输大市成条街。去年，公司亦作供股，供股价11.33元，但供股遇认购不足，股价直插，低见9.95元。经过此低潮后，这两周股价表现终有些起色，昨高见12.5元，收报11.94元，已企回供股价上，只要后市未有进一步失守11.3元，可望捱过低潮，股价走势逐步改善。技术来讲，短期如能有效收复12.4元阻力位，向上挑战13.3元。

月内分别有里昂、花旗、瑞银及中金公司发表中国建筑的分析报告，中期目标分别上望15元、14元、14.99元及14元。四行对该股2017年度的每股盈利预测分别为1.07元、1.16元、1.21元及1.13元，而2018年度分别为1.36元、1.46元、1.31元及1.35元。公司已公布2018年新签订单目标为1，150亿元，隐含11.5%的同比增长。中金认为在PPP项目监管政策趋严所带来的影响于今年第一季后逐渐消失后，在公司定单仍有增长势头，而预计现金流又改善下，前景尚见稳健。

论今年盈利及派息惊喜，可以考虑深圳国际（00152）。据银河国际援引公司管理层指出，截至2017年底，公司两个房地产项目取得良好进展，特别是前海项目，因为公司能为2017财年确认28.4亿元的一次性税前收益。银河就预计其2017财年度的派息将更高，有机会达到每股0.91元，以报告时股价造15.6元计算，相应股息率为5.83%。今年而言，相信深圳国际的土地资产可望逐步释放价值，如将梅林关专案的部分股权出售给协力厂商开发商，以及从深圳政府就前海专案获得更多赔偿，由此提升该股估值。

加上，公司持有深圳航空49%权益，由于滙兑收益的关系，人民币走势强劲，深圳航空2017年有望录得不俗利润，银河预计其2017年和2018年度的利润分别为11.26亿元和12.31亿元，占深圳国际此两年核心净利润预测的23.7%及24.5%。而年初内地又公布了飞机票价可市场化的消息，深航作为中国国航的子公司，相信未来可以受益票价的弹性安排。考虑到深国于2016至2019年核心利润预测年均复合增长率为26.7%，中期股价的目标上望至19.67元。
参考深圳国际月綫图走势，去年已有效突破14元阻力，按突破10元至14元的长方形推算，量度升幅约至18元。国泰君安月内也有报告设定该股目标挑战17.9元，保守可以此作为目标价，止蚀14元，昨收15.78元，回近15元可收集。

最后回说大市，升势持续。恒指昨收31412，升0.94%，大市成交额1,389.74亿元，守稳30000，亦步亦趋重探2007年高位近32000。国指方面，昨收报12468，升1.41%，守稳12000，反覆挑战14000。且看内险股周内股价表现较为反覆整固，但内银股耐力厚，逐步攀升，四大行中的农行（01288）、工行（01398）及建行（00939）已同步于国指升穿去年高位。留意内险股，短期股价虽稍有反覆，在整固，但只要抖足气，再发力，将有利国指反覆向上挑战新高，轮流攻坚，令中期升浪维稳。（完）
注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

,The market is not crazy, buy behind the red chips / Lin Ruifen

In 2018, nearly two weeks have passed. In Hong Kong stock markets, there is indeed a gradual spread and widening of the market. In the great era, it is not yet crazy enough and may be even more crazy during the year.
HSBC (00005) made a fortified move in the week, hoping Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co.,Ltd. Hong Kong (02388) and Standard Chartered (02888) to pump up on Thursday.

Medium-sized red chips lagging behind last year took turns driving in two weeks. As earlier fare increases, the price hike of China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited (00291) was stimulated. Outdated red chips also hit the jackpot. As China State Construction Engineering Corporation Limited (03311), which fell below the offer price last year, yesterday saw a gain of 12.5 yuan and has risen its offer price. Guangguo (00257) sharp rise in share price on Thursday broke through 11 yuan resistance also drove ahead, yesterday rose further 2% to 11.92 yuan closing, the major trend challenge 13 yuan. CHINA RESOURCES GAS GROUP LIMITED (01193) You are welcome, shares rose 3.5% yesterday to close at 25.2 yuan.

Last year, China State Construction Engineering Corporation Limited was a serious loser with a 6% drop for the whole year, underperforming the market. Last year, the company also made a rights issue for the offering price of 11.33 yuan, but the subscription for the rights issue was insufficient and the stock price plunged to a low of 9.95 yuan. After this ebb, these stock prices ended up some improvement in the past two weeks. Last saw a gain of 12.5 yuan to close at 11.94 yuan. The stock price has been raised back. As long as the stock market fails to fall further to 11.3 yuan, it is expected to be able to weather the doldrums and the stock price will gradually improve. Technology, short-term, if effectively recovered 12.4 yuan resistance, up 13.3 yuan challenge.

Analysts report for China State Construction Engineering Corporation Limited released by Lyon, Citigroup, UBS and China International Capital Corporation Limited respectively in the month with medium-term targets of 15, 14, 14.99 and 14 respectively. The four-line estimate of EPS for 2017 is 1.07 yuan, 1.16 yuan, 1.21 yuan and 1.13 yuan respectively, compared with 1.36 yuan, 1.46 yuan, 1.31 yuan and 1.35 yuan respectively in 2018. The company has announced that the newly signed orders in 2018 will reach 115 billion yuan, implying a year-on-year increase of 11.5%. China International Capital Corporation Limited believes that the outlook for the Company is still solid due to the still growing momentum in the Company's orders after the gradual disappearance of the impact of tightened regulatory control on PPP projects after the first quarter of this year.

On this year's earnings and dividend surprise, you can consider SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED (00152). According to Galaxy International, the management of the company pointed out that as of the end of 2017, the two real estate projects of the Company made good progress, especially the Qianhai project, as the Company was able to confirm a one-off pretax profit of RMB2.84 billion for FY17. Galaxy expects its dividend to be higher in FY17 with an opportunity to reach 0.91 yuan per share. Based on the report's price of 15.6 yuan, the corresponding dividend yield is 5.83%. For the current year, I believe SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED is expected to gradually release its land assets such as selling part of the Merlin Project to third party developers and obtaining more compensation from the Shenzhen government for the Qianhai project, thereby enhancing the Stock valuation.

In addition, the Company holds a 49% interest in Shenzhen Airlines and due to the strong exchange rate gains, RMB is expected to record strong profits in 2017. Galaxy expects its profits in 2017 and 2018 to be RMB1,126 million and RMB 1,231 million, accounting for 23.7% and 24.5% of the core net profit forecast of SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED for the two years respectively. In the beginning of this year, the Mainland announced the marketability of its fares. As a subsidiary of Air China Limited, Shenzhen Airlines believes in the flexibility of fares for the future. Taking into account the deep core 2016-2019 core profit forecast CAGR of 26.7%, medium-term target price hikes to 19.67 yuan.

With reference to the monthly chart of SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED, it effectively broke the resistance of 14 yuan last year and calculated the increase to about 18 yuan according to a rectangle that exceeded 10 yuan to 14 yuan. Guotai Junan Securities Co.,Ltd. also reported that the unit set a target of 17.9 yuan during the month. Conservatives could target this target at a 14-point stop loss and a gain of 15.78 yuan and a return of nearly 15 yuan.

Finally, back to the market, the rally continued. The Hang Seng Index closed at 31412, up 0.94%. The turnover of the market was 138.974 billion yuan, holding steady at 30,000 points. In 2007, the Hang Seng Index swelled to a high of nearly 32,000 points. The H-Share Index yesterday closed at 12,468, up 1.41%, holding steady 12000, repeatedly challenged 14000. However, the performance of Stock Life Insurance Index within the week was relatively flat. However, the strength of domestic banking stocks was soaring and steadily rising. ABC (01288), ICBC (01398) and CCB (00939) High. Attention to the insurance stocks, although the short-term share price is slightly reversed, the consolidation, but as long as shake gas, and then force, will be conducive to the national index repeatedly challenge up a new high, turning storming, so that stable growth in the medium term. (Finish)

管，深化交易所债市改革，努力推动市场实现高质量发展，稳步提高直接融资比重。

中新社北京1月14日电 （记者
阮煜琳）近期部分城市环境空气质量自动监测站点受到喷淋干扰，中国环境保护部14日通报查处结果。并表示，对于环境监测弄虚作假和人为干扰问题，视情节轻重，相关部门对其处以行政处罚、刑事处罚，连带追究民事责任。
环保部通报称，中国环境监测总站通过对国控环境空气自动监测站点例行检查时发现，2017年9至10月期间，江西省新余市飞宇、河南省信阳市南湾水厂两个国控站点附近有雾炮车喷雾作业，水雾直接喷淋空气质量监测采样口及周围局部环境，该行为干扰了环境空气质量监测活动正常进行。两地经调查核实，视情节轻重已依纪依法分别给予直接责任人和分管责任人辞退、行政记过等行政处分。
“水雾直接喷淋国家网或地方网的空气质量监测采样口及周围局部环境，干扰了环境空气质量监测活动正常进行”，环保部监测司负责人14日对记者表示，环保部已要求各地环保部门将环境监测数据弄虚作假和人为干预行为纳入当地环境违法举报受理平台，便于社会和公众监督举报。
环保部通报指出，请地方政府和环保部门全面排查，加强监管，一旦发现人为干扰问题，严肃查处。并欢迎各界举报环境监测弄虚作假和人为干扰行为。
环保部表示，下一步，对于环境监测弄虚作假和人为干扰问题，发现一起、查处一起、通报一起，视情节轻重，相关部门对环境监测弄虚作假处以行政处罚、刑事处罚，连带追究民事责任。同时，加大查处力度，确保环境监测不受干预，环境监测数据全面真实客观准确。（完）

中新社沈阳1月14日电 （记者
沈殿成）据中共沈阳市委宣传部14日消息，13日在北京召开的中国改革(2017)年会暨深改五周年高层研讨会上，沈阳市打造国际化营商环境成功入选全国十大年度优秀改革案例，这是东北地区唯一入选的改革案例，也是沈阳市改革案例首次入选。
此次入选的十大年度优秀改革案例，主要集中在公立医院改革、国企改革、脱贫攻坚、农村产权制度改革、行政审批制度改革、生态文明建设、创新驱动发展、现代城市建设等当下重点的改革领域。
中国经济体制改革杂志社社长、地方改革创新研究中心主任潘治宏指出，沈阳市将打造国际化营商环境作为加快新一轮振兴发展的主要切入点和有力突破口，提出了破解东北老工业基地体制机制难题的“沈阳方案”。
“要用政府的‘痛’换来企业的‘爽’，沈阳干部必须有这种境界和胸怀。”中共沈阳市委书记易炼红的话，体现了沈阳坚定不移将打造国际化营商环境不断推向深入的决心和信心。
2017年以来，沈阳市全力打造国际化营商环境，深入开展五大专项整治行动，累计解决问题2675个，出台营商举措2140条。营商综合运转平台作用充分发挥作用，窗口服务投诉下降90%，解决诉求14.2万件，解决率达96%。
沈阳市“放管服”改革持续深化，投资项目的审批时限缩减52%，营商环境越来越优、办事效率越来越高。（完）

,China news agency, Shenyang, January 14 (Reporter

SHEN Diancheng) According to the Propaganda Department of the CPC Shenyang Municipal Committee on the 14th, the 13th held in Beijing on the China Reform (2017) Annual Meeting and the fifth anniversary of the seminar to deepen the reform, to create an international business environment in Shenyang City, the successful selection of the top ten countries Outstanding reform case, this is the only selected case of reform in Northeast China, is also the first case of Shenyang City, the reform case selected.

The selected ten outstanding reform cases of the year are mainly focused on the current key reforms such as public hospital reform, state-owned enterprise reform, poverty alleviation, reform of rural property rights system, reform of administrative examination and approval system, construction of ecological civilization, innovation-driven development and modern urban construction field.

Pan Zhihong, president of China Economic System Reform Magazine and director of the Center for Local Reform and Innovation Research, pointed out that Shenyang City will create an international business environment as a major entry point and a powerful breakthrough in accelerating the new round of rejuvenation and development. He proposed to crack the system of northeast old industrial bases Mechanism of the problem of ""Shenyang program.""

If we want to use the government's 'pain' in return for the company's 'coolness,' Shenyang cadres must have such a realm and mind."" Yi Lianhong, secretary of the CPC Shenyang Committee, reflects Shenyang's steadfastness in creating an international business environment Push for deep determination and confidence.

Since 2017, Shenyang has endeavored to create an international business environment and conducted in-depth five special rectification actions, totally solving 2,675 issues and issuing 2140 business initiatives. Comprehensive operation of the platform to fully play a role in business, window service complaints dropped 90% to resolve the 142,000, the resolution rate of 96%.

The reform of ""Undertaking and Service"" in Shenyang continued to deepen. The time limit for approval of investment projects was reduced by 52%. The business environment was getting better and better and the efficiency of work was getting higher and higher. (Finish)

路透香港1月15日 \- 中国中化集团的房地产和酒店业务分支--
中国金茂0817.HK周一宣布，以先旧后新方式发行约9亿股新股，集资约33.3亿港元，将用作一般营运资金。
公司的公告称，其大股东中化香港（集团）有限公司过配售代理，按每股3.7港元配售约9亿股旧股，相当于现有及经扩大后已发行股本分别约8.43%及7.78%；完成后中化再以同等作价认购相同数量的中国金茂新股。
配售价较中国金茂上周五（12日）收盘价3.97港元折让6.8%。
完成配售及认购后，中化在中国金茂的持股比例，将由原来的53.95%摊薄至49.76%。（完）

,Reuters Hong Kong, January 15 \ - Sinochem's real estate and hotel business branch -

China Jinmao Holdings Group Ltd. 0817.HK announced on Monday that it will issue approximately 900 million new shares in an up-front fashion with approximately HK $ 3.33 billion to be used for general working capital.

The company's announcement said its major shareholder Sinochem Hong Kong (Group) Co.,Ltd. had placed approximately 900 million shares of the existing shares at an issue price of HK $ 3.7 per share, representing approximately 8.43% and 7.78% of the existing and enlarged issued share capital respectively %; Upon completion, Sinochem subscribed an equal number of new shares of China Jinmao Holdings Group Ltd. at the same price.
The placing price represents a discount of 6.8% to the closing price of China Jinmao Holdings Group Ltd. of HK $ 3.97 last Friday (12 days).
Upon completion of the placing and subscription, the shareholding of Sinochem in China Jinmao Holdings Group Ltd. will be diluted from 53.95% to 49.76%. (Finish)

路透上海1月15日 \-
中国大型航空及投资集团海航集团旗下的天海投资600751.SS900938.SS周日晚刊登澄清公告称，公司不存在海外媒体所报导的出售子公司Ingram
Micro Inc.（英迈国际）事项，后者的云集市业务模式已引入中国市场，投资价值逐步显现。
天海投资在2016年底完成以60亿美元收购英迈国际100%股权的交易。该公司在公告中称，英迈国际是公司的重大战略性投资项目，是公司重要的转型发展基石和业务资产。
公告指出，2017年公司将英迈国际全球领先的云集市业务模式引入中国，并推出海航云集市，英迈国际为海航云集市提供从技术平台、上游合作伙伴到下游渠道分销商在内的全方位支持。目前，海航云集市已正式上线。
天海投资高层在近日接待调研时表示，海航云集市的目标是围绕“一带一路”成长模式，业务覆盖东盟、中东、欧洲等，为“一带一路”沿线国家实现数字化赋能，力争在三年内成为国内领先的提供端到端服务的一站式云分销平台，力争在五年内成为中国云服务增值最大的流量入口平台。
该公司高层指出，通过链接国内外优质云厂商、云服务提供商，为客户提供高性价比和高附加值的云增值服务。借助公司云集市统一门户，客户可获得云服务订阅以及围绕云服务的咨询、规划、迁移、部署、自动计费、7*24
呼叫中心等一站式端到端服务。现已签约14家云厂商，合作伙伴包括阿里云、腾讯云、华为云、金山云等重量级云厂商，已上线七家。
未来海航云集市将结合公司间接控股股东海航集团实体产业的场景需求，通过人工智能、大数据、云计算（ABC）技术平台，构建核心行业云服务产品；同时将逐步形成包含智能客服云、刷脸考勤云、酒店云、创业云、空港云、智慧安检云、智能助手、数据生态开放平台、旅游大数据服务平台等多个云服务方案，推动“ABC+X”技术能力产品和“4+X”行业共享服务产品的布局。
因存在重要事项待核实，天海投资股票上周五临时停牌。为避免公司股价异常波动，公司股票周一继续停牌一天。上周四该公司A股收报6.49元人民币。（完）
(发稿 林琦; 审校 张喜良)

,Reuters Shanghai January 15 \ -
Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co.,Ltd.,a unit of China's major aviation and investment group HNA Group, 600751.SS900938.SS said late on Sunday that the company does not have Ingram
Micro Inc. (Ingram Micro International) matters, the latter's cloud market business model has been introduced into the Chinese market, the investment value gradually appear.

Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co.,Ltd. completed the transaction to acquire 100% of Ingram Micro International for USD6 billion by the end of 2016. In the announcement, the company said Ingram Micro International is a major strategic investment project for the company and an important cornerstone of its transformation and business assets.

Announcement pointed out that in 2017 the company will Ingram Micro International's leading global cloud market business model introduced to China, and the introduction of Hainan Airlines market, Ingram Micro International for Hainan Airlines market from the technical platform, upstream partners to downstream distributors, including the entire Location support. At present, Hainan Airlines market has been formally launched.

In a recent survey conducted by Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co.,Ltd.,HNA indicated that the goal of HNA cloud market is to focus on the ""One Belt and One Road"" growth model with business coverage of ASEAN, the Middle East and Europe and to digitally energize the countries along the ""Belt and Road"" And strive to become one of the leading one-stop cloud distribution platforms providing end-to-end services in China within three years and strive to become the largest value-added traffic entrance platform for China's cloud services within five years.

The company executives pointed out that by linking high-quality cloud manufacturers at home and abroad, cloud service providers, to provide customers with cost-effective and high value-added cloud value-added services. With the corporate cloud portal, customers can get cloud service subscriptions and consulting, planning, migration, deployment, auto-billing around cloud services, 7 * 24

Call centers and other one-stop end-to-end service. Has signed 14 cloud manufacturers, partners include Aliyun, Tencent Holdings Limited cloud, Huawei cloud, KINGSOFT CORPORATION LIMITED Cloud and other heavyweight cloud vendors, has been on-line seven.

In the future, HNA Cloud Market will build on core cloud service products through artificial intelligence, big data and cloud computing (ABC) technology platforms in combination with the scene needs of HNA Group's entity industry, an indirect controlling shareholder of the Company. At the same time, Face to face attendance cloud, hotel cloud, venture cloud, airport cloud, smart security cloud, intelligent assistant, data ecological open platform, travel big data service platform and many other cloud service solutions, and promote ""ABC + X"" technical capability products and ""4+ X ""industry shared service product layout.

Due to important issues to be verified, the shares of Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co.,Ltd. were suspended temporarily last Friday. In order to avoid abnormal fluctuations in the company's stock price, the company continued to suspend one day on Monday. Last Thursday, the company A shares closed at 6.49 yuan. (Finish)

資料提供:
分析重點：
1\. 民航局及發改委剛下達新政，推進民航國內綫市場化改革，熱門航綫有望加價，改善民航公司盈利能力。
2\. 民航版「供給側改革」持續發酵，新航季供需改善。航空股板塊指數自2017年12月至今已累升17.3%，市場反應正面。
3\. 綜合大行觀點，新政下南航（01055）盈利助力更大。
三大航空股南航、國航（00753）、東航（00670），自上月起全綫強勢起飛，打破過去2年的橫行格局，帶領航空股板塊指數同期上升17.3%。久旱逢甘露，皆因國策接連出擊，改善民航市場營運生態。
最近國策利好，莫過於今年1月5日，民航局及國家發改委印發《關於進一步推進民航國內航空旅客運輸價格改革有關問題的通知》，進一步推進民航市場化改革。內地航空業的票價市場化，其實早於2004年已開始推進（詳見下文「MT政策追蹤
--民航市場化 財來有大門」），惟今次在兩方面的放寬力度均見加強，且超過市場預期。
航綫加價 迎消費升級
一是新增「市場調節價」（即由政府指導價改為市場定價）航綫數量。今次新增306條市場調節價航綫，令總數增至1,030條。同時，今次出現多條熱門航綫，特別是北京、上海、廣州、深圳，四大一綫城市的五條互飛航綫全數放開。
由於這四大一綫城市人均消費力強，而且商務客佔比重，加價空間龐大。以例子說話，北京往上海的經濟艙票價最高限在1,240元（人民幣‧下同），但飛去旁邊的杭州，最貴票價已達2,200元。在人均可支配收入增加、消費升級大環境下，國人出行更願意搭飛機，令民航客運量近年維持高速增長，並為價格市場化提供合適空間。
二是加價幅度：每條航綫每航季（即半年）最多加10%。另外，由過往每間公司最多10條航綫加價，增為可加價航綫的15%。華創證券計算出，三大航空公司中以南航本次可加價航綫數最多，詳見表一。
民航供給側 立竿見影
加價迎質變，航班調整為市場帶來量變。民航局2017年9月發布《關於把控運行總量調整航班結構提升航班正點率的若干政策措施》，並從2017年冬春航季（去年10月底起），調整航班結構並控制航綫運行總量，被視為民航版「供給側改革」。
新例實行後，三大航空公司去年11月的營運數據立竿見影。南航、國航、東航該月客座率分別達82.3%、81.4%及80.4%，同比增加3、1.8及1.3個百分點。營運指標則顯示，在屬於淡季的11月，機位已供不應求，並為即將展開的2月春節客運高峰奠下加價基礎。
在航班縮減的大方向下，華創證券指出，大型航空公司在航距拉長下，優勢將明顯高於其他航企，更能提升飛機的使用效���。如此一來便造就出供給側改革的一貫場景：市場逐漸向行業龍頭集中，強者愈強。
南航盈利助力較大
摩根士丹利上周四調升三大航空股評級，再推動一波升勢。該行認為，國內航綫於2018年至2020年的票價定價水平有上升空間，將可推動中資航空股盈利上升。當中，對南航最為進取，評級由「減持」升至「增持」，目標價由4.65元升至10.8元，更大升公司2018年及2019年純利預測79%及235.7%
另外，最新的市場化改革集中於國內航綫，對南航利好尤甚（另外兩家分析可見另文「MT板塊攻略--炒航空股
油價滙價也要識」）。華創及興業證券分別推算，加價一次對三大航空股的影響，一致認為對南航提升純利助力最大，反映票價上升空間開放後，將大大提振航企盈利。高盛則估計，國內航綫每加價1%，南航2018年每股盈利可增加12%，優於國航、東航的7%及9%。
彭博綜合市場預測，南航2018年每股盈利增長19.4%，對應PE為11.9倍。瑞信、中銀國際分別給予目標價9.8及9.7元。

Analysis focus:

1 \ Civil Aviation Authority and Development and Reform Commission just issued a new deal to promote civil aviation domestic market-oriented reform, the hot airlines are expected to increase fares to improve the profitability of civil aviation companies.

2 \. Civil Aviation version of ""supply-side reform"" continued to ferment, SIA season supply and demand improved. The aviation sector sector index has soared 17.3% so far in December 2017 and the market is positive.
3 \. Integrated Bank of China point of view, under the New Deal China Southern Airlines Company Limited (01055) more profitable.

China Southern Airlines Company Limited (00753) and China Eastern Airlines (00670), the top three airliners, took off vigorously from the beginning of last month, breaking the horizontal pattern of the past two years and leading the aviation sector sector index by 17.3% over the same period. A long drought every nectar, are due to national policy one after another to improve the operation of civil aviation market ecology.

Recent national policy is good, than January 5 this year, the Civil Aviation Authority and the National Development and Reform Commission issued ""on the further promotion of civil aviation domestic air passenger transport price reform notice"" and further promote the civil aviation market-oriented reform. In fact, the marketization of fares in the Mainland's aviation industry started earlier than 2004 (see ""MT Tracking Policy"" below
- Civil Aviation market to have the door to wealth ""), but both efforts to ease the current efforts to strengthen, and exceeded market expectations.
Route fare upgrade welcome consumption

The first one is the addition of ""market adjustment price"" (that is, the price changed from the government guidance price to the market price) to the number of routes. This time, an additional 306 market adjustment routes have been added to increase the total number to 1,030. In the meantime, there are a number of hot air routes appearing this time, in particular the five inter-airline routes opened in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen and the four major first-tier cities.

As the per capita spending power of the four major first-tier cities, and the proportion of business customers, a huge space for price increases. As an example, the maximum economy class fare for Beijing to Shanghai is 1,240 yuan (RMB ‧ the same as below), but the most expensive fare has reached 2,200 yuan to fly to Hangzhou next to it. Under the circumstance of increasing disposable income per capita and upgrading of consumption, people traveling abroad are more willing to fly so that civil aviation passenger traffic will maintain rapid growth in recent years and provide suitable space for the marketization of prices.

Second, the rate of increase: each route season (ie half a year) up to 10%. In addition, a fare increase of up to 10 routes per company in the past will be increased to 15% of the flotilla route. China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited Securities calculated that the three largest airlines China Southern Airlines Company Limited this fare increase routes, as shown in Table I.
Civil Aviation supply side immediate

Fare increase the quality of change, flight adjustment brought changes in the market. Civil Aviation Authority issued in September 2017 ""on the control of the total amount of flight structure to adjust the flight punctuality of a number of policy measures"", and from the winter season in 2017 (late last year), adjust the flight structure and control the total route operation Amount, is regarded as the civil aviation version of ""supply-side reform.""

After the implementation of the new lawsuit, the operating statistics of the three major airlines in November last year immediately. China Southern Airlines Company Limited, Air China, China Eastern Airlines this month, passenger load factor reached 82.3%, 81.4% and 80.4%, an increase of 3,1.8 and 1.3 percentage points. Operating indicators also showed that in November when the off-season was in the off-season, the supply was in short supply and laid the ground for a fare increase for the forthcoming peak of passenger traffic in February.

In the general direction of the reduction of flights, the securities of China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited pointed out that advantages of large airlines will be significantly higher than those of other airlines while their airlines are lengthened, which will further enhance the efficiency of the aircraft. As a result, a consistent scenario of supply-side reform has been created: the market is gradually becoming more and more concentrated in the industry, and the stronger are the stronger.
China Southern Airlines Company Limited profitability larger

Morgan Stanley on Thursday raised the rating of the three major aviation stocks, and then promote a wave of rally. The bank believes there is room for domestic airlines to raise ticket prices from 2018 to 2020, which will boost the profitability of Chinese-funded airline stocks. Among them, China Southern Airlines Company Limited was the most aggressive and its rating was upgraded from ""Underweight"" to ""Overweight"". Its target price increased from $ 4.65 to $ 10.8, further boosting the company's net profit forecasts for 2018 and 2019 by 79% and 235.7%

In addition, the latest marketization reform focused on domestic routes, especially for China Southern Airlines Company Limited (the other two analysts see another article, ""MT Block Raiders - fried airlines

Oil prices have to know the exchange rate ""). China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited and INDUSTRIAL SECURITIES CO.,LTD. Respectively estimated that the impact of the fare increase on the three major aviation stocks was unanimously considered to be the largest boost to China Southern Airlines Company Limited's net profit. After the opening of the fare increase space, Airlines will greatly boost profitability. Goldman Sachs reckons that for every 1% fare increase of domestic routes, China Southern Airlines Company Limited's EPS will increase 12% in 2018, which is better than 7% and 9% of Air China and China Eastern Airlines.

Bloomberg comprehensive market forecast, China Southern Airlines Company Limited 2018 Earnings per share increased 19.4%, corresponding to PE 11.9 times. Credit Suisse and BOCI respectively gave their target price of 9.8 and 9.7 yuan.

路透新加坡1月15日 \- 新加坡金管局局長孟文能周一稱，當加密貨幣崩盤時，希望不會損及支持此類貨幣的區塊鏈等技術。
新加坡一直把自己定位成金融科技中心，但強調對於購買加密貨幣要“極為謹慎”。
“我希望當熱潮退卻、當發生崩盤時，它不會殃及與數字貨幣和區塊鏈相關的更深遠、更有意義的技術，”新加坡金管局局長孟文能說道。
孟文能還稱，他不排除金管局直接向公眾發行加密貨幣的可能性，但他不確定這是個好主意。(完)

,Reuters SINGAPORE January 15 - Monetary Authority of Singapore Meng Wenneng said on Monday that when the cryptocurrency collapses, it hopes not to hurt technologies such as the blockchain that support such currencies.
Singapore has long positioned itself as a financial technology hub, but has emphasized ""extreme caution"" about buying cryptocurrencies.

I hope it will not hurt the more far-reaching and meaningful technology associated with the digital currency and the blockchain when a boom breaks down,"" said Meng Wenneng, director of the Singapore Monetary Authority.
Meng also said he does not rule out the possibility of the HKMA issuing cryptocurrencies directly to the public, but he is not sure this is a good idea. (Finish)

新加坡一直把自己定位成金融科技中心，但强调对于购买加密货币要“极为谨慎”。
“我希望当热潮退却、当发生崩盘时，它不会殃及与数字货币和区块链相关的更深远、更有意义的技术，”新加坡金管局局长孟文能说道。
孟文能还称，他不排除金管局直接向公众发行加密货币的可能性，但他不确定这是个好主意。(完)

新华社罗安达1月14日电（记者吴长伟）当地时间1月14日，正在安哥拉进行正式访问的中国外交部长王毅在罗安达与安哥拉外长奥古斯托会谈后共同会见记者。
王毅表示，很高兴在中安建交35周年之际来访。安哥拉是中国在非洲的战略合作伙伴，双方有着深厚传统友谊。建交35年来，两国始终真诚友好、平等相待、相互支持。双方互利合作一直走在中非合作的前列。当前，中国已经成为安哥拉第一大贸易伙伴、第一大石油出口市场和第一大融资来源国。中安战略伙伴关系是中非合作共赢、共同发展的一个范例和缩影。
昨天晚上我一下飞机就拜会了洛伦索总统，刚才同奥古斯托外长举行了深入会谈。双方一致认为，值此中安建交35周年之际，双边关系面临承前启后、继往开来；两国合作需要转型升级、提质增效。双方一致同意，进一步深化政治互信，在涉及彼此核心利益问题上继续坚定相互支持。进一步创新合作思路，沿着互利共赢的方向，拓展新的合作领域，让中安合作更好惠及两国和两国人民。
王毅表示，作为安哥拉可信赖的老朋友和好朋友，中方将坚定支持安哥拉探索适合本国国情的发展道路，支持安哥拉推进经济多元化和工业化战略，支持安哥拉提高自主发展能力，支持安哥拉为非洲的和平与发展事业发挥更积极作用。（完）

,Xinhua News Agency, Luanda, January 14 (Reporter Wu Changwei) On January 14 local time, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi, who was on an official visit to Angola, met with reporters after the Luanda and Angola Foreign Minister Augusto held talks.

Wang Yi said he is pleased to visit China Security & Fire Co.,Ltd on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations. Angola is China's strategic partner in Africa with a profound traditional friendship. Since the establishment of diplomatic ties 35 years ago, the two countries have always been sincere and friendly, treated each other as equals and supported each other. The mutually beneficial cooperation between the two sides has always been at the forefront of the cooperation between China and Africa. At present, China has become Angola's largest trading partner, the largest oil export market and the largest source of financing. China Security & Fire Co.,Ltd is a model and epitome of win-win cooperation and common development of China-Africa cooperation.

Last night I interviewed President Lorenzo as soon as I took off the plane and just held in-depth talks with Foreign Minister Augusto. Both parties agreed that on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China Security & Fire Co.,Ltd, bilateral relations are facing unprecedented challenges and going forward. The cooperation between the two countries needs upgrading and efficiency enhancement. Both parties unanimously agreed to further deepen political mutual trust and continue to firmly support each other on issues involving each other's core interests. We will further innovate our cooperation ideas and develop new areas for cooperation in the direction of mutual benefit and win-win cooperation so that the cooperation between China Security & Fire Co.,Ltd will benefit the two countries and peoples.

Wang Yi said that as a credible friend and good friend of Angola, China will firmly support Angola in exploring a development path suited to its own national conditions, support Angola in its strategy of promoting economic diversification and industrialization, support Angola in enhancing its capacity for independent development, and support Angola in Africa The cause of peace and development play a more active role. (Finish)

久邦GOMO三个转型背后的中国移动互联网发展史
PR Newswire
广州, 2018年1月15日电
广州2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --

2017年，手机终端的数量在全球范围内已经超过了电脑终端。移动互联网也基于手机终端的普及和通信技术的迭代蓬勃发展起来。在中国移动互联网发展的历史中，久邦GOMO是一家绕不开的企业。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。从收费到免费、从塞班到安卓、从国内到国外的战略转型，在一次次成就久邦GOMO的同时，也引领着中国移动互联网的发展。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。模式转型：从收费到免费
在2004年3G门户出现之前，中国手机上网主要通过通信运营商，这会产生一定的费用。移动端便于携带，可以随时随地获取信息，但人们希望通过手机获取信息的需求和昂贵的上网门槛产生了冲突。
当时，久邦GOMO的创始人邓裕强嗅到了移动互联网中免费的先机，率先开创了国内首个免费的WAP网站
--3G门户，从此引领移动互联网走上免费模式的道路。从收费到免费，意味着移动互联网更加贴合自身的属性，意味着手机用户在随时随地获取免费的信息的同时，商业模式也随之改变。
免费的信息获取并不代表信息本身不具备价值，而是信息通过更广泛的传播获取收益。当在手机上获取信息越来越便捷的时候，用户数和使用粘性会不断提高，流量越多的地方，广告价值越高，成为连接买方与卖方的新桥梁。
3G门户运用其大量用户来进行移动互联网商业模式的探索，率先在移动互联网广告中获取收益。从收费到免费的模式转变，成就了早期的久邦GOMO。
平台转型：从塞班到安卓
在3G门户作为移动互联网入口之一取得巨大成功之时，久邦GOMO已经开始研发另外的手机流量入口
--基于塞班平台的“手机心脏”。2008年，久邦GOMO的领导人邓裕强带领团队研发“手机心脏”已经有一年多，“手机心脏”是一款集桌面美化、天气预报、智能IP拨号和网络浏览器于一集的多功能软件。
当项目已经初步成型的时候，安卓来了。谷歌2008年10月发布了第一款安卓手机。安卓系统自身所具备的开放性能够兼容各式各样的移动硬件，在安卓平台上软件开发的方便自由，让久邦GOMO意识到，这将是移动互联网的未来。于是高层立即做出决策，放弃塞班，转向安卓。但这也意味着，团队一百多人努力了一年多的结果喊停。据久邦GOMO总裁朱志描述：“
当时很多人哭了。但裕强对趋势的判断非常准确，面对大家的压力，裕强很坚定。”
几个月后，久邦GOMO研发的GO桌面、GO输入法、GO短信等一系列GO产品发布，席卷全球总榜。伴随着手机终端的不断普及和通信技术的不断迭代，安卓在全球的市场份额逐渐取代了塞班。
放弃塞班，转向安卓，这个基于移动互联网趋势精准判断下的取舍，再次成就了久邦GOMO。
战场转型：从国内到国外
平台转型之后，久邦GOMO逐渐从门户业务转向移动互联网的APP业务。
移动互联网迅猛发展，使得百度、阿里、腾讯这三大互联网公司也逐渐进入到移动互联网领域，三足鼎立的局面逐渐形成。随着时间的推移，中国的移动互联网人口红利减弱，市场也逐渐稳定饱和。但是，国外的移动互联网仍是一片蓝海。相对国内用户而言，海外用户有着比较良好的软件使用付费习惯，对于在免费的应用中植入广告的形式接受程度也较高。
移动工具类产品成为第一个攻占点。久邦GOMO以其工具产品中个性化的主题、皮肤，轻便快速启动的桌面、相机等应用迅速抢占了海外手机工具应用市场。
久邦GOMO目前拥有超过三十款的APP在海外安卓平台发布，旗下应用中的主题、皮肤出售，以及在流量大的基础上进行的广告发行，第三次成就了久邦GOMO，也奠定其移动互联网出海领导者的地位，制造了一定的移动互联网出海壁垒。久邦GOMO是最早进行移动互联网出海的企业，也是第一个在纳斯达克上市的中国移动互联网企业。
如今，越来越多的中国移动互联网企把目光转向海外，工具类产品的竞争也日趋激烈。2017年，久邦GOMO在海外工具市场成熟的情况下，战略布局了游戏、以及内容（直播GOLive、短视频Viedo
Me、新闻资讯BuzzHunt等）业务，将再次寻求移动互联网的转型。

The long history of GOMO behind the three transformations of China Mobile Limited Internet history
PR Newswire
Guangzhou, January 15, 2018
Guangzhou, January 15, 2018 / PRNewswire / -

In 2017, the number of mobile terminals in the world has exceeded the computer terminal. Mobile Internet is also booming based on the popularity of mobile terminals and the iteration of communication technologies. In the history of the Internet development of China Mobile Limited, the long-awaited GOMO is a company that can not be turned around. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. From charging to freeing, the strategic transformation from Saipan to Android and from home to foreign countries led the development of the China Mobile Limited Internet while implementing the GOMO for a long time. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. Model transformation: from free to free

Prior to the emergence of the 3G portal in 2004, China's mobile Internet access was mainly through the telecommunications carriers, which incurred a certain fee. The mobile is easy to carry and has access to information anytime, anywhere, but people want the conflict between the need to access information via their mobile phones and the expensive Internet access threshold.
At that time, the founder of long-state GOMO Deng Yuqiang smelled free mobile Internet initiative, pioneered the first free WAP site in China

- 3G portal, from leading the mobile Internet on the road to free mode. From charging to free means that the mobile Internet is more fitting with its own attributes, which means that while mobile users get free information anytime, anywhere, the business model also changes.

Free access to information does not mean that the information itself does not have the value, but rather through a wider dissemination of information for revenue. When getting information on mobile phones more and more convenient, the number of users and the use of viscosity will continue to increase, the more traffic, the higher the value of advertising, as buyers and sellers to connect the new bridge.

3G portal to use its large number of users to explore the business model of mobile Internet, the first mobile Internet advertising for income. From charges to free mode change, the achievements of the early long Bang GOMO.
Platform Transformation: From Symbian to Android
When the 3G portal was a huge success as one of the mobile Internet portals, the long-awaited GOMO has started to develop additional handset traffic entrances

- ""Cell Phone Heart"" based on Symbian platform. In 2008, a long time ago, the leader of the GOMO leader Deng Yuqiang led the team to develop the ""mobile phone heart"" which is a multi-functional software that integrates desktop beautification, weather forecasting, intelligent IP dialing and web browser .

When the project has been initially formed, Andrews came. Google released the first Android phone in October 2008. Android system itself has the openness to be compatible with a wide range of mobile hardware, software development on the Android platform, free and easy, so long Bang state GOMO realize that this will be the future of the mobile Internet. So senior immediate decision-making, to give up Saipan, turned to Andrews. But that also means that more than a hundred people in the team worked hard for more than a year to halt their results. According to Zhu Zhi, president of GOMO for a long time, ""
Many people were crying at that time. However, Yu Qiang's judgment on the trend is very accurate. In the face of everyone's pressure, Yu Qiang is very firm. ""

A few months later, GOBO Bang GOMO developed GO desktop, GO input method, GO SMS and a series of GO products released, sweeping the world total list. With the continuous popularization of mobile terminals and the continuous iteration of communication technologies, Android gradually replaced Saipan in the global market share.
Abandoned Saipan, turned to Andrews, this based on the precise judgments of the trend of mobile Internet trade-offs, once again achieved the long-Bang GOMO.
Battlefield transition: from home to abroad
After the platform transformation, the long-Bang GOMO gradually shifted from the portal business to the mobile Internet APP business.

Rapid development of mobile Internet, making Baidu, Ali, Tencent Holdings Limited these three Internet companies have gradually entered the field of mobile Internet, the three pillars of the gradual formation of the situation. With the passage of time, China's mobile Internet demographic dividend weakened, and the market also gradually stabilized and saturated. However, the overseas mobile Internet is still a blue ocean. Compared with domestic users, overseas users have relatively good paying habits of software usage, and are also more accepting of the form of advertisement embedded in free applications.

Mobile tools products become the first capture point. Jubang GOMO quickly seized the market for mobile handset applications overseas with its personalized themes in its tool products, skins, lightweight quick-start desktops and cameras.

Jubang GOMO currently has more than thirty models of APP released in the overseas Android platform, its application theme, the sale of the skin, as well as the flow of large-scale advertising, the third achievement of the long state GOMO, also laid Mobile Internet leader in the sea to the status of mobile Internet to create a certain barrier to the sea. The long-established GOMO is the earliest mobile internet company and the first China Mobile Limited internet company listed on NASDAQ.

Nowadays, more and more China Mobile Limited Internet companies turn their attention overseas, and the competition for tool products is getting fiercer. In 2017, Jubang GOMO strategic layout of the game in the overseas tool market, as well as the content (live GOLive, short video Viedo
Me, BuzzHunt, etc.) business, will once again seek the transformation of the mobile Internet.

韩统一部长官：韩朝商讨艺术团访韩意义重大
韩联社首尔1月15日电
韩国统一部长官赵明均15日欢送将到边境与朝鲜商讨艺术团访韩事宜的韩方代表团时表示，这是在韩朝高级别会谈后进行的首场工作会谈，意义重大，朝方似也格外重视向平昌冬奥派遣艺术团的问题。
赵明均当天在首尔的南北会谈本部送行时叮嘱代表团与本部保持密切沟通，但也不必有太大压力。赵明均答记者问时表示，朝方已表示即将就通盘商讨朝鲜来韩参奥问题的工作会谈事宜联系韩方，本周内召开参奥工作会谈的可能性很大。韩方12日提议举行工作会谈全面落实高级别会谈达成的协议，但朝方提议首先进行艺术团来韩工作会谈。赵明均就此解释称，艺术团来韩表演所需的技术性准备较多。
朝方曾在9日的高级别会谈上将遣返2016年集体投奔韩国的前朝鲜驻华餐厅女员工作为举办韩朝离散亲人团聚活动的条件，赵明均表示，朝方只是重申既有立场，并非强势表态硬碰硬。他补充道，朝方表示目前不便讨论离散亲人问题，并提议待韩朝关系进一步改善后再议此事。（完）

,Unification Minister Han: It Is Great Significance for the ROK to Discuss the Art Troupe to Visit Korea
Yonhap News Seoul, January 15

On the 15th, the ROK Unification Minister Zhao Mingjun said that this is the first working meeting to be held after the high-level talks between the ROK and the DPRK. It is significant that the DPRK also attaches special importance to peace. Chang Dong Austrian art troupe dispatch.

On the same day, Zhao Mingjun urged the delegation to maintain close communication with the headquarters while sending off the headquarters of the North-South talks in Seoul. However, it is not necessary to exert too much pressure. When Zhao Ming answered reporters' questions, the DPRK side said that it is highly likely that it will contact the ROK side about the work talks on an overall North Korea's participation in the ROK issue of participation in the Olympics in North Korea. There is a good chance that talks will be held this week. South Korea Proposes Work Talks on the 12th To fully implement the agreement reached at the high-level talks, but the DPRK proposes to first conduct a work meeting between the troupes and the ROK. Zhao Mingjun explained in this regard that the troupe needed more technical preparations for the performance of the troupe.

On the 9th, the DPRK will repatriate the former Korean women's resident women stationed in Korea collectively in 2016 as conditions for organizing a reunion of separated Korean and Korean relatives. Zhao Mingjun said the DPRK just reiterated its position and not a strong stand-in point . He added that the DPRK side said it is inconvenient to discuss the issue of separated relatives and proposes to discuss the matter after the relationship between the two countries further improves. 路透北京1月14日 \-
中國中央電視台(簡稱“央視”)周日報導，伊朗油輪桑吉號(Sanchi)已經沉沒，周圍水面有大量漏油在燃燒。該船1月6日在東海海域與一艘貨船相撞後起火燃燒已逾一周。
央視報導稱，這艘油輪與香港籍散貨船CF Crystal輪碰撞後起火，於周日中午(0400GMT)左右“突然爆燃”。
央視援引中國海上搜救中心上海指揮部的消息稱，目前船體已經沉沒。其播放的視頻顯示騰起的黑煙，海面有火焰可見。報導稱，船隻沉沒時間在下午05:00(0900GMT)前。
新華社報導稱，中國國家海洋局表示，由於船體發生爆炸，周圍水域有大量漏油在燃燒。
海洋局稱將擴大監測範圍，並針對沉船溢油開展監視監測，及時掌握溢油分布、漂移擴散狀況。
桑吉號船上人員共計32人，包括30名伊朗籍和兩名孟加拉國籍，之前發現三具尸體。伊朗官方稱，其餘29名船員和乘客據信已經死亡。
桑吉號油輪為伊朗國家油輪公司(National Iranian Tanker Co)所有，裝載將近100萬桶凝析油，原定運往韓國。(完)
****如欲參考原文報導，請點選 (Full Story)即可擷取瀏覽****
(編譯 鄭茵 審校 張濤)
(( yin.zheng@thomsonreuters.com ; 010-66271025; Reuters Messaging:
yin.zheng.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net ))
,Reuters Beijing January 14 \ -

China Central Television (CCTV) reported on Sunday that Iranian oil tankers Sanchi have sunk and there is a lot of oil spill burning around the water. The ship caught fire more than a week after its collision with a cargo ship in the East China Sea on January 6.
CCTV reported that the oil tanker caught fire after collision with a Hong Kong-born bulk carrier, Crystal Flywheel, and ""suddenly deflagrated"" around noon on Sunday (0400GMT).

CCTV quoted the China Maritime Search and Rescue Center headquarters in Shanghai as saying that the hull has now sunk. The video that it plays shows smoke rising from the sea with flames visible. According to reports, the ship sunk before 05:00 (0900GMT) before.
Xinhua News Agency reported that China's State Oceanic Administration said that due to the explosion of the hull, a large amount of oil spill around the area was burning.
Oceanic Bureau said it will expand the scope of monitoring, monitoring and monitoring of shipwreck oil spills, timely grasp of the distribution of oil spills, drift and dispersion.

Sanjay crew of 32 people in total, including 30 Iranian and two Bangladeshi nationals, had found three bodies. Iranian officials say the remaining 29 crew members and passengers are believed to have died.
The Sanchi tankers, owned by the National Iranian Tanker Co.,loaded nearly 1 million barrels of condensate and were destined for South Korea. (Finish)

urnnewsmlreuters.com20180114nL3S1P90O81,"
路透北京1月14日 \-
中国中央电视台(简称“央视”)周日报导，伊朗油轮桑吉号(Sanchi)已经沉没，周围水面有大量漏油在燃烧。该船1月6日在东海海域与一艘货船相撞后起火燃烧已逾一周。
央视报导称，这艘油轮与香港籍散货船CF Crystal轮碰撞后起火，于周日中午(0400GMT)左右“突然爆燃”。
央视援引中国海上搜救中心上海指挥部的消息称，目前船体已经沉没。其播放的视频显示腾起的黑烟，海面有火焰可见。报导称，船只沉没时间在下午05:00(0900GMT)前。
新华社报导称，中国国家海洋局表示，由于船体发生爆炸，周围水域有大量漏油在燃烧。
海洋局称将扩大监测范围，并针对沉船溢油开展监视监测，及时掌握溢油分布、漂移扩散状况。
桑吉号船上人员共计32人，包括30名伊朗籍和两名孟加拉国籍，之前发现三具尸体。伊朗官方称，其余29名船员和乘客据信已经死亡。
桑吉号油轮为伊朗国家油轮公司(National Iranian Tanker Co)所有，装载将近100万桶凝析油，原定运往韩国。(完)

(编译 郑茵 审校 张涛)

【時報-
台北電】森鉅(8942)公告2017年度自結營業收入淨額45億440萬5000元，銷貨毛利14億8713萬7000元，毛利率33.02%，營業淨利10億2792萬7000元，業外支出14億4615萬9000元，稅前淨損4億1823萬2000元，歸屬予母公司業主稅前淨利5508萬2000元。
2017年度自結合併損益說明如下：
1.毛利率下降主要係新台幣兌美元之平均銷售匯率升值6.11%及認列存貨減損8776萬4000元，以致毛利率從2016年39.20%到2017年33.02%，下降6.18%。2.業外支出14億4615萬9000元主係認列A.新台幣升值認列兌換損失為3億5934萬9000元；B.認列資產減損損失新台幣11億2503萬4000元。
3.屬母公司認列之業外支出為A.資產減損7億7088萬5000元，B.兌換損失3億2621萬3000元
2017年資產減損及兌換損失計新台幣10億9709萬8000元影響每股盈餘6.61元。4.認列各項成本、費用及支出後，稅前淨利屬母公司為新台幣5508萬2000元。5.2017年度自結數尚未經會計師簽證查核，實際數字，以公司公告經會計師查核簽證之財務報告為主，特此說明。(編輯整理：龍彩霖)

以下内容节选自1月15日的《期货日报》：
易盛农期指数上周以继续振荡为主。
权重品种上周走势分化，白糖、菜油、菜粕表现相对偏弱，而棉花相对偏强。总体来看，目前春节备货需求对农产品价格存在支撑，但随着时间推进，支撑力将逐渐弱化，叠加拉尼娜影响不及预期等，预计后期农产品供应压力将上升，其上方阻力将不断增强，因此，后市易盛农期指数延续振荡的可能性较大。(完)

,The following is an excerpt from the Futures Daily on January 15:
Yi Sheng agricultural index last week to continue the oscillation.

Weights of species differentiation trend last week, sugar, vegetable oil, rapeseed performance is relatively weak, while cotton is relatively strong. In general, the current demand for stocking in the Spring Festival supports the prices of agricultural products. However, with the passage of time, the supportive force will gradually be weakened. With the impact of less than expected increase in La Nina, the supply pressure on agricultural products is expected to rise in the late period and the resistance above it will continue to increase. Therefore, Market outlook Yingsheng agricultural index continued the possibility of oscillation. (Finish)

【時報-
台北電】南港輪胎（2101）2017年合併營收113.25億元，年增9.8％，是近三年來的高峰。新竹新豐廠產能擴充五成，加上今年起，歐洲龍頭廠代工訂單大增，南港指出，今年將延續去年營運成長動能而更上層樓，預估會有雙位數的成長。
產品朝高值化發展，以及提升俄羅斯、日本市場占有率有成，是南港認為去年營收成長主要原因。南港指出，歐洲第一品牌訂單今年增加；新豐廠產能開出，也讓平均生產成本可望降低一成，在出貨量增加，成本下滑下，預估今年的營業毛利率還有提升的空間。
南港新竹新豐廠產能已由先前的日產1.2萬條提高至1.8萬條，擴產幅度達五成，產能利用率也衝高至九成以上。
法人指出，南港輪胎去年前三季受到全球人工膠、天然膠等原物料行情波動劇烈，加上匯率波動，營業毛利率跌破20％；2018年在原料價格穩定、成本下滑下，預估毛利率可望比去年提升3-4個百分點。（新聞來源：工商時報─袁延壽／台北報導）

NANKANG RUBBER TIRE CORP.,LTD. 電子書取代不了紙書，卻顛覆了出版業。過往，作家寫好著作，要通過出版社那一關，才可以跟讀者見面。歷史證明，許多出版社有眼無珠，錯過了不少暢銷書。如今，直接出版蔚成風氣，作家不用仰人鼻息，可自行在網上出版作品。
自己發表作品
《格雷的五十度陰影》是最成功的例子。假若此書用傳統的方法向出版社投石問路，以其文筆之拙劣，故事之離經叛道，能否出版也成疑問。就算可以出版，能否暢銷也成疑問。另一個成功例子便是安迪韋亞（Andy
Weir）。他正職是電腦程式編寫員，自小喜歡創作科幻小說，在自設的網站連載他寫的《火星人》 （The
Martian），獲得賞識，改編成電影《火星任務》，並出版成紙書，賺得逾10萬美元的版權費。內地當紅的網上作家，所得更遠超此數。
亞馬遜的Kindle直接出版平台，不單任何人均可發表作品，還有應用程式給作者設計封面和編排、定價等。流風所及，蘋果、巴諾書店（Barnes &
Noble）隨即設立直接出版平台。英國不少出版社推出紙書前，先以99便士平價發售電子書，積累了口碑及好評後才推出紙書。
這些平價電子書大多是類型小說，良莠不齊。調查發現，大部分讀者都無法卒讀這些小說，一般只有20%讀者讀畢全書，但因價錢平，讀者並不介懷，反正這些「三毫子小說」（Pulp
Fiction）的讀者，大多品味不高，旨在消磨時間，讀直接出版的電子書，可省回不少金錢呀！對作者來說，直接出版所得遠多於紙書，總好過將作品交出版社發落。
2017年5月，Kindle舉辦了首屆電子書獎，名為Kindle Storyteller
Award。參賽的作品必須是在Kindle直接出版平台發表的新書，任何類型小說或非小說都可以。冠軍可獲2萬英鎊獎金。結果由David
Leadbeater所寫的犯罪驚險小說The Relic Hunters奪魁。此新紮小說家，過去5年在Kindle發表了23部作品，銷量近100萬冊。
撰文：占飛

,E-books can not replace paper books, but subvert the publishing industry. In the past, writers write well, through the press that pass, we can meet with the reader. History has proven that many publishers have lost their eyebrows, missed a lot of best-selling book. Nowadays, publishing directly into the genre, writers do not need to admire, can publish their works online.
Write your own work

Gray's Fifty Shades is the most successful example. If this book uses the traditional method to ask the press for advice, its clumsiness in writing, the deviation from the story, and the question of whether it can be published or not. Even if it can be published, is also questionable whether the best-selling. Another successful example is Andy
Weir). His current job is a computer programmer, childhood like to create science fiction, in his own website serial he wrote ""Martian"" (The

Martian) to gain recognition, adapted into the movie ""Mars Mission,"" and published in paper books, earning over $ 100,000 in royalties. Popular online writer in the Mainland, the income more than this number farther.
Amazon Kindle direct publishing platform, not only anyone can publish works, as well as applications to the author cover design and layout, pricing and so on. Flows, Apple, Barnes & Noble (Barnes &
Noble) immediately set up a direct publishing platform. Before the publication of a large number of publishers in the United Kingdom, a paper book was first offered at an e-book price of 99 pence.

Most of these cheap e-books are type novels, which are mixed. The survey found that most readers can not read these novels, only 20% of readers generally read the book, but the price is flat, the reader does not mind, anyway, these ""three millon novels"" (Pulp

Fiction readers, most of them are not tasteful. They are designed to kill time and read directly published e-books, saving a lot of money! For the author, the direct publication of income far more than paper books, better than the work submitted to the publishing house.
In May 2017, the Kindle hosted the first e-book award, the Kindle Storyteller
Award. The entry must be a new book published on the Kindle's Direct Publishing Platform, any type of novel or non-fiction. Champion will receive 20,000 pound bonus. Results from David
Leadbeater wrote crime thriller novel The Relic Hunters won the first prize. This new tie novelist, over the past five years in the Kindle published 23 works, sales of nearly 1 million.

本资料由(上市公司)新日光公司提供

序号:1            发言日期:107/01/15              发言时间:11:24:04发言人:洪传献  发言人职称:董事长暨执行长 发言人电话:(03)578-0011主旨:说明媒体报导符合条款第49款 事实发生日:107/01/15说明1.事实发生日:107/01/152.公司名称:新日光能源科技股份有限公司3.与公司关系(请输入本公司或子公司):本公司4.相互持股比例:不适用5.传播媒体名称:经济日报107年1月13日A4 版6.报导内容:...新日光董事长洪传献昨（12）日表示，预定今年第3季完成合并，预估成立隔年即可获利，五年后营收将达900亿至1,000亿元...7.发生缘由:应证交所要求说明8.因应措施:针对经济日报报导本公司说明如下:〃...，预估成立隔年即可获利，五年后营收将达900亿至1,000亿元....〃，此为合并后的团队努力目标，并非本公司财务预测。9.其他应叙明事项:本合并案并非外界所言之「电池大联盟」，而是纳入各家公司自身优势，发挥垂直整合产生的综效，在电池方面，透过设备优化、降低成本，摆脱长约与老旧设备等包袱，希望可以建立一个平台，把各家的优势搭配出来，使电池良率提升，拉升电池竞争力。矽晶圆方面，约一半的产能做为矽砖(silicon brick)生产，销售予其他客户，这在目前是有获利的，另一半做为公司垂直整合之用；在模组方面，将走向品牌化，藉以提升其附加价值，供给台湾及全球客户使用；在系统方面将在现有基础下，持续扩大台湾及全球的系统建置，以增加稳定获利来源。透过矽晶圆、电池、模组到系统等业务之整合，合并后的公司将是国内垂直整合最完整的太阳能公司。未来在年产能的规划上，希望矽晶圆可以从500MW扩增至1GW，电池从5GW优化至6.2GW，模组达到2~3GW、系统500MW~1GW的规模，在上述商业模式的整合下，合并后第二年希望转亏为盈，五年后营收希望达900~1000亿元，以上皆为合并后经营团队的努力目标。

Serial Number: 1 Speaking Date: 107/01/15 Speaking Time: 11: 24: 04 Speakers: Hong Chuanxian Spokesman Title: Chairman and Chief Executive Spokesman Telephone: (03) 578-0011 Subject: Remarks Media reports conform to Clause 49 Facts Date of Occurring: 107/01/15 Remarks 1. Facts Date: 107/01/152 Company Name: Neo Solar Power Corp. Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. 3. Relationship with the Company (Please enter the Company or its subsidiaries ): The Company 4. Mutual Shareholding Ratio: Not Applicable 5. Media Name: Economic Times January 13, 107 A4 Version 6. Cover Content: ... Neo Solar Power Corp. Chairman Hung Chuan Xian yesterday (12) Said it is scheduled to complete the merger in the third quarter of this year, the estimated profit after the establishment of the next year, revenue will reach 90 billion to 100 billion yuan in five years ... 7. Reasons: In response to the SEC request for clarification 8. Response measures : In response to the Economic Daily reported that the Company described as follows: 〃 ...,estimated to be established next year to profit, revenue will reach 900 billion to 100 billion yuan in five years .... 〃, which for the combined team efforts The goal, not the company's financial projections. 9. Other things that should be stated: This merger is not a ""big battery alliance"" as it has been said in the world. Rather, it incorporates the advantages of each company and exerts the synergistic effect of vertical integration. On the battery side, through equipment optimization and cost reduction , Get rid of the burden of long-term and old equipment, etc.,hoping to establish a platform, with the advantages of each out, so that the battery yield increase, boosting the competitiveness of the battery. About half of silicon wafer capacity is produced as silicon brick and sold to other customers, which is currently profitable and the other half used as vertical integration for the company. In terms of modules, Brand to enhance its added value for Taiwan and global customers; on the system basis, it will continue to expand its system establishment in Taiwan and the rest of the world to increase its stable profit source. Through the integration of silicon wafer, battery, module to system business, the combined company will be the most vertically integrated solar company in China. Future plans for annual production capacity, the hope that the silicon wafer can be expanded from 500MW to 1 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,the battery is optimized from 5 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd. to 6.2 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,the module reaches 2 ~ 3 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,a system of 500MW ~ 1 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,the size of the business model in the integration, the second year after the merger hopes to turn around, five years after the hope of revenue up 900 ~ 1000 100 million yuan, all of these are the combined efforts of the management team goals.

新日光 3576.TW 即時重大訊息之詳細內容
本資料由(上市公司)新日光公司提供

序號:1            發言日期:107/01/15              發言時間:11:24:04發言人:洪傳獻  發言人職稱:董事長暨執行長 發言人電話:(03)578-0011主旨:說明媒體報導符合條款第49款 事實發生日:107/01/15說明1.事實發生日:107/01/152.公司名稱:新日光能源科技股份有限公司3.與公司關係(請輸入本公司或子公司):本公司4.相互持股比例:不適用5.傳播媒體名稱:經濟日報107年1月13日A4 版6.報導內容:...新日光董事長洪傳獻昨（12）日表示，預定今年第3季完成合併，預估成立隔年即可獲利，五年後營收將達900億至1,000億元...7.發生緣由:應證交所要求說明8.因應措施:針對經濟日報報導本公司說明如下:〃...，預估成立隔年即可獲利，五年後營收將達900億至1,000億元....〃，此為合併後的團隊努力目標，並非本公司財務預測。9.其他應敘明事項:本合併案並非外界所言之「電池大聯盟」，而是納入各家公司自身優勢，發揮垂直整合產生的綜效，在電池方面，透過設備優化、降低成本，擺脫長約與老舊設備等包袱，希望可以建立一個平台，把各家的優勢搭配出來，使電池良率提升，拉升電池競爭力。矽晶圓方面，約一半的產能做為矽磚(silicon brick)生產，銷售予其他客戶，這在目前是有獲利的，另一半做為公司垂直整合之用；在模組方面，將走向品牌化，藉以提升其附加價值，供給台灣及全球客戶使用；在系統方面將在現有基礎下，持續擴大台灣及全球的系統建置，以增加穩定獲利來源。透過矽晶圓、電池、模組到系統等業務之整合，合併後的公司將是國內垂直整合最完整的太陽能公司。未來在年產能的規劃上，希望矽晶圓可以從500MW擴增至1GW，電池從5GW優化至6.2GW，模組達到2~3GW、系統500MW~1GW的規模，在上述商業模式的整合下，合併後第二年希望轉虧為盈，五年後營收希望達900~1000億元，以上皆為合併後經營團隊的努力目標。
*以上資料均由各公司依發言當時所屬市場別之規定申報後，由本系統對外公佈，資料如有虛偽不實，均由該公司負責。
,Neo Solar Power Corp. 3576.TW For immediate details on important messages

Facts Date: 107/01/152 Company Name: Neo Solar Power Corp. Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. 3. Relationship with the Company (Please enter the Company or its subsidiaries ): The Company 4. Mutual Shareholding Ratio: Not Applicable 5. Media Name: Economic Times January 13, 107 A4 Version 6. Cover Content: ... Neo Solar Power Corp. Chairman Hung Chuan Xian yesterday (12) Said it is scheduled to complete the merger in the third quarter of this year, the estimated profit after the establishment of the next year, revenue will reach 90 billion to 100 billion yuan in five years ... 7. Reasons: In response to the SEC request for clarification 8. Response measures : In response to the Economic Daily reported that the Company described as follows: 〃 ...,estimated that after the establishment of a year to profit, revenue will reach 900 billion to 100 billion yuan in five years .... 〃, which for the combined team efforts The goal, not the company's financial projections. 9. Other things that should be stated: This merger is not a ""big battery alliance"" as it has been said in the world. Rather, it incorporates the advantages of each company and exerts the synergistic effect of vertical integration. On the battery side, through equipment optimization and cost reduction , Get rid of the burden of long-term and old equipment, etc.,hoping to establish a platform, with the advantages of each out, so that the battery yield increase, boosting the competitiveness of the battery. About half of silicon wafer capacity is produced as silicon brick and sold to other customers, which is currently profitable and the other half used as vertical integration for the company. In terms of modules, Brand to enhance its added value for Taiwan and global customers; on the system basis, it will continue to expand its system establishment in Taiwan and the rest of the world to increase its stable profit source. Through the integration of silicon wafer, battery, module to system business, the combined company will be the most vertically integrated solar company in China. Future plans for annual capacity, the hope that the silicon wafer can be expanded from 500MW to 1 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,the battery is optimized from 5 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd. to 6.2 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,the module reaches 2 ~ 3 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,a system of 500MW ~ 1 GlobalWafers Co.,Ltd.,the size of the business model in the integration of the second year after the merger hope to turn around, five years after the hope of revenue up to 900 ~ 1000 100 million yuan, all of these are the combined efforts of the management team goals.

路透北京1月14日 \-
新华社周六晚间报导援引中国钢铁工业协会2018年理事扩大会称，经过两年的持续推进去产能，钢铁行业产能严重过剩的矛盾得到有效缓解，钢铁企业产能利用率基本恢复到了合理区间。
报导援引中国钢铁工业协会会长靳伟并称，由于行业效益明显好转，企业融资环境有望改善，一些企业又萌生了产能扩张的念头。当前产能过剩的矛盾依然存在，尤其要警惕新一轮产能扩张的冲动。
“虽然两年来化解了超过1.15亿吨的产能，清除了‘地条钢’，去产能工作取得了阶段性成果，但基础还不牢固，特别是‘地条钢’死灰复燃、违法违规和一哄而上建电炉等，极有可能吞噬去产能成果。”靳伟说。
他介绍称，2017年中国钢铁市场环境明显改善，钢材价格合理回升，12月末钢材价格指数为121.8点，同比上涨22.4%，企业盈利能力增强，行业效益明显好转。
去年1-11月，中钢协会员钢铁企业累计实现销售收入3.35万亿元人民币，同比增长35.1%；实现利润1,578亿元，较上年增长3.6倍；企业平均销售利润率4.7%，提高了3.2个百分点，河钢等一批企业净利润超过100亿元，一些长期亏损的企业也实现扭亏为盈。（完）
(发稿 乔艳红; 审校 张喜良)
(( tina.qiao@thomsonreuters.com ; 86-10-6627 1282; Reuters Messaging:
tina.qiao.reuters.com@reuters.net ))
,Reuters Beijing January 14 \ -

Xinhua News Agency reported on Saturday night quoted the China Iron and Steel Association 2018 council enlargement said that after two years of continuous push to capacity, the iron and steel industry, the serious overcapacity contradictions have been effectively alleviated, the steel production capacity utilization rate has basically returned to a reasonable range.

According to the report, Jin Wei, president of China Iron and Steel Association, quoted the company as saying that due to the obvious improvement in industry benefits, the financing environment for enterprises is expected to improve, and some enterprises have sprung up their idea of ​​capacity expansion. The current overcapacity contradictions still exist, in particular, be alert to the impulse of a new round of capacity expansion.

Although more than 115 million tons of production capacity has been eliminated over the past two years, the groundwork steel has been cleared and the phased results have been achieved in capacity-to-production work, but the foundation is still not solid. In particular, the groundwork steel has resurfaced, On the electric furnace, etc.,most likely to devour to capacity results. ""Jin Wei said.

He said that in 2017, the environment in China's steel market improved significantly. Steel prices rebounded reasonably. The steel price index at the end of December was 121.8 points, up by 22.4% over the same period of last year. The profitability of enterprises increased and the industry efficiency improved significantly.

From January to November last year, the steelmaking enterprises of CISA members realized a total sales revenue of 3.35 trillion yuan, an increase of 35.1% over the same period of last year; profits of 157.8 billion yuan, an increase of 3.6 times over the previous year; and the average sales profit rate of enterprises increased by 4.7% 3.2 percentage points, a group of companies such as river steel net profit of more than 10 billion yuan, some long-term loss of the company also realized turnaround. (Finish)
(Published Qiao Yanhong; review Zhang Xi Liang)

【時報記者任珮云台北報導】電競品牌廠微星(2377)，今年舉辦第二屆《英雄聯盟》電競學習營，此次電競學習營安排學員體驗當下最夯的VR遊戲：Project
Cars賽車及VR背包槍擊對戰等，提供虛擬實境對戰的現場實境。
微星科技-
微星大學於2017年暑假舉辦第一屆《英雄聯盟》電競學習營，邀請總教練貝克及前《閃電狼》教練CYO擔任指導，活動獲得參加學員極大的肯定與回響，微星大學協理許寶仁表示：「微星科技傾聽玩家聲音，除了給玩家最符合需求的硬體配備外，更希望能將台灣電競實力向上提升，讓教練與選手們的珍貴實力、經驗，能傳授給未來的電競選手，因此舉辦能讓學員真正學到『職業級技巧』的電競學習營。」
微星電競學習營的最大特色就是讓教練針對戰隊一對一「專屬」指導，每個電競戰隊都有最適合自己的Meta套路，藉由與教練的深入討論與激盪，結合自己擅長角色，精進Meta與技巧。活動中，二位教練亦會針對遊戲營運、團隊之間有效溝通、角色訓練、兵線、走位等等技巧，做最完整的說明及傳授眉角。
本屆電競學習營邀請總教練貝克及J Team退役職業選手Bebe擔任學習營的客座指導，學習營為期三天二夜。

【時報-
台北電】中視熱播中的八點檔《軍師聯盟》收視節節高升，隨著劇情走向，張鈞甯飾演的柏靈筠也將登場，為戲再掀高潮。聊起《軍師聯盟》，張鈞甯以「教科書」形容，表示對她別具意義，尤其看到吳秀波、于和偉等老戲骨同台飆戲，不光是驚豔、過癮，讓她也藉此學習前輩的表演，受益良多。
其實張鈞甯謙虛了，近年演技大突破的她，飾演柏靈筠成功演繹出轉折和層次，連吳秀波也盛讚她的演技。她對劇中被司馬懿認同是一家人的那場戲，備覺深刻，因為和「柏靈筠」相處了大半年，已經融入這人的性格中，同樣身為女人，很能同理她真正所要追求的情感，所以劇中欣喜抱住司馬懿完全是出於自然，這場戲不光感動她自己，觀眾看了也動容。
《軍師聯盟》中的柏靈筠，起初是曹丕為了在司馬家布眼線，而賞賜給司馬懿當妾，但司馬懿的才識與智謀，讓她動了真情。張鈞甯演這角色，不少網友聯想到電影《色，戒》中湯唯所飾演的王佳芝，都是帶著任務接近男人，最後卻愛上對方。
張鈞甯對演藝事業一向很有自己的想法，她認為當演員愈沒有極限愈好，這樣就愈敢於嘗試各種角色。張鈞甯趁工作空檔為戲加碼宣傳，明（16日）晚9點到星座專家唐綺陽老師的直播餐桌現場和網友見面。
《軍師聯盟》不只是三國史詩大戲，還寫進家庭、親情、情愛等多種戲路，既能看權謀爭鬥，還能看情愛糾葛以及司馬家族溫馨的另一面，讓此戲一上檔就引起各界名人討論，包括文化大學新聞系教授胡幼偉、資深媒體人張景為、歷史老師曹若梅等，都曾以專文論述這部戲。該劇在中視播出以來，收視上揚至1.40，預期會隨著劇情繼續攀升。

【時報-
台北電】華視上周召開董事會，董事長陳郁秀羅織缺乏領導力、管理能力不足等「7大罪狀」，裁定郭建宏「不適任」，自3月1日起解除總經理職務，引發各界譁然。業界盛傳導火線係因郭建宏擋了台獨大老、民視董事長郭倍宏屬意的人事案，阻礙其「台獨三台」的進程，郭建宏昨表示如果華視將來真的變成「台獨台」，則必死無疑，台灣藝人會愈來愈不敢上華視節目，勢必再少一個表演舞台。
雖然深陷被拔除免職風暴，郭建宏14日一早仍與朋友在淡水高爾夫球場打球，他說自己沒什麼特別情緒，本來就是以輕鬆心情看待這事，過去半年來他都是憑著一股「不能讓他們這樣玩」的意志力在撐，只希望日後他們找來的人能為華視及台灣影視圈多做點事。
是否後悔走這一遭？郭建宏表示，沒什麼好後悔的，他很欣慰華視這一年的成長大家都看得到，自己也並非因為貪汙而下台，是帶著政績離開，「我帶領的華視，讓台灣看到了華視、也讓世界看到華視。」華視原本虧損3.35億元，董事會希望虧損能降到2.3億，他這一年已把虧損降到1.67億元。
他任內找了余天、張菲開兩檔綜藝節目，也為了NCC規定的新播率拍攝自製八點檔，把被媒體形容像鬼棚的攝影棚重新整理，八點檔成績雖然不夠好會再檢討，但至少好或不好，都可以接受公評。
陳郁秀今（15日）下午將帶著部分董監事及新聞部經理莊豐嘉召開記者會，顯然是將進一步聲討郭建宏。郭建宏是否會仿效陳郁秀11日以「下班路過」為由跟著開記者會正面迎擊，他苦笑說「我才不會這麼幼稚」。

Taipei Electric Power] CES held a board of directors last week, Chairman Chen Yu Xiu Luo woven lack of leadership, lack of management capacity and other ""7 counts"", ruled that Guo Jianhong ""discomfort"", since March 1 to lift the post of general manager, triggering an uproar in all walks of life . The rumor that the industry is rumored to be guilty of fire broke out because Guo Jianhong blocked the case of Taiwan's eldest and ignored the case of chairman Guo Bihong, hindering the process of ""three Taiwan's independence."" Guo Jianhong said yesterday that if Chinavision really becomes a ""Taiwan-Taiwan"" There is no doubt that Taiwanese artists will increasingly dare not to show their programs on China and there is bound to be another performance stage.

Although he was deeply trapped in a storm of removal from office, Guo Jianhong still plays with his friends at Tamsui Golf Course early in the morning on the 14th. He said he has no particular emotion. He just thought of it in a relaxed mood. For the past six months, he has relied on "" They play so much ""willpower, only hope that they will be able to do more for CTS and the Taiwan film industry in the future.

Do you regret this? Guo Jianhong said he regrets nothing. 【時報-
台北電】由於蘋果智慧音箱HomePod即將上市，而良維（6290）主提供HomePod電源線，預估第一季出貨量約有200萬條，全年出貨量則上看1000萬條，將挹注良維今年營收成長三到四成；而受惠全球半導體設備市場持續成長，京鼎（3413）去年12月營收9.04億元，創下年度最高，近期該兩檔都獲投資人青睞，股價表現相對大盤強勁。

市場法人推估，2月份HomePod即將開賣，而良維主負責提供HomePod相關連接線，目前訂單狀況優於預期，且良率達90％以上，單價及毛利率都優於平均水準，將有助於帶動營收及獲利成長，對公司今年營運表現相當樂觀。法人也預估，良維今年在蘋果新品的加持之下，蘋果占良維營收比例有望上看50％。良維去年12月營收5.41億元，年增4.88％，也小幅優於11月的5.39億元，去年累計營收63.07億元，年減6.62％。
半導體設備廠京鼎，受惠半導體設備拉貨，及遞延的自動化設備訂單，去年第4季營收有機會創去年新高，在法人仍看好今半導體設備景氣下，京鼎股價受市場買盤推升，12日收在231元，漲幅2.9％。
京鼎去年11、12月營收，受惠於遞延的自動化設備訂單效應，加上半導體設備需求持續暢旺，法人預估京鼎去年全年每股盈餘約有13元。展望今年，SEMI（國際半導體產業協會）預估，今明年晶圓廠設備支出都會創新高，大環境將有利台系半導體設備廠今年營運。另外，京鼎積極爭取鴻海州面板廠設備訂單，可望延續去年強勁成長力道。（新聞來源：工商時報─林燦澤／台北報導）

In December last year, Levy reported a revenue of 541 million yuan, an annual increase of 4.88%, also slightly better than 539 million yuan in November. Last year, its total revenue was 6.307 billion yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 6.62%.

Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc.,a semiconductor equipment manufacturer that benefited from the pick-up of semiconductor equipment and orders for deferred automation equipment, had the opportunity to achieve a record high revenue in the fourth quarter of last year. While the legal person is still optimistic about the current semiconductor equipment, Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc The stock price was up by the market buying, closing at 231 yuan on the 12th, or 2.9%.

Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc. Revenue for November and December last year, benefiting from deferred orders for automation equipment and the continued robust demand for semiconductor equipment, corporate legal person estimates Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc. last year's full-year earnings per share of about 13 yuan . Looking forward to this year, SEMI (International Semiconductor Industry Association) forecast that wafer fab equipment spending will hit a new high this year and the environment will benefit Taiwanese semiconductor plant operators operating this year. In addition, Foxsemicon Integrated Technology Inc. actively strives for Hon Hai panel equipment orders, is expected to continue last year's strong growth momentum. 【時報記者郭鴻慧台北報導】全球學名藥產業競爭激烈，上游原料藥廠獲利遭到壓縮，神隆(1789)2017年度營收年減少12.76%，年度獲利表現恐將也會下滑。展望2018年度，學名藥市場隨大廠整併近尾聲，今年價格壓力有機會減緩，神隆營運將步出谷底，法人預期今年度營收表現將持平，但獲利可望微幅增加。
神隆近年雖積極開發新藥原料藥，及下游針劑合作案，不過，法人表示，2018~2019雖有多項新品上市，但上市初期貢獻不會太大，加上佔比較高的學名藥原料藥仍衰退，預期今年度營收將與2017年大致持平，稅後淨利將落在4.8億元附近，較去年度微幅成長。
神隆新藥研發代工及策略聯盟合作案在2017年有不錯的表現，未來將持續成為營運主要成長動能。神隆有3個客戶產品預期將在2018年申請藥證，2019年有機會上市，將成為中長期營運成長動能。在策略聯盟方面，目前已有16項產品進行中，2018年可望有3項產品正式取得藥證，產品上市後，神隆除了持續銷售原料藥，也將取得市場銷售分潤，法人預估，2018年策略聯盟收入將維持成長趨勢。

,【Times reporter Guo Honghui in Taipei】 ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd. (1789) reported a 12.76% annual decline in revenue in 2017. The profitability of the annual profit may also decline . Prospects 2018, the generic drug market with the entire factory near and ending, the price pressure this year have the opportunity to slow down, ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd. will be out of operation at the bottom, corporate expectations for the current year revenue performance will be flat, but the profit is expected to be slightly increase.

ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd. In recent years, although active development of new drug APIs and downstream injection cooperation cases, however, the legal person said that there are a number of new products listed in 2018 ~ 2019, but the initial public offering will not be too large, with a higher proportion of scientific names Drugs drug stocks are still declining. Revenue from this year is expected to be roughly the same as in 2017. Net profit after tax will fall around RMB 480 million, a slight increase from the previous year.

ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd. New Drug R & D Foundry and Strategic Alliances Partnership has shown good performance in 2017 and will continue to be a major growth driver in the future. Three client products of ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd. are expected to apply for a drug certificate in 2018 and will have the opportunity to go public in 2019, which will become a medium-term and long-term growth momentum of operations. In terms of strategic alliances, there are currently 16 products in progress and 3 drug products are expected to be formally approved in 2018. After the products are put on the market, ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd.,in addition to its continuous sales of APIs, will also gain a market share margin. Corporate estimates, strategic alliance in 2018 revenue will maintain the growth trend.

ADI与香港科技大学机器人研究院签署校企合作协议机器人研究助力粤港澳大湾区创新发展PR Newswire
北京, 2018年1月15日电
北京2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ -- Analog Devices,
Inc.(http://www.analog.com/en/index.html)(ADI)公司今天宣布，与香港科技大学机器人研究院正式签署工业合作伙伴计划(IPP)。双方将积极合作寻求技术突破，以创新助力粤港澳大湾区的建设与发展，支持中国提出的将加快建设创新型国家的国策。Analog
Devices, Inc.

(ADI)公司今天宣布，与香港科技大学机器人研究院正式签署工业合作伙伴计划(IPP)。双方将积极合作寻求技术突破，以创新助力粤港澳大湾区的建设与发展，支持中国提出的将加快建设创新型国家的国策。作为立足粤港澳大湾区内的全球知名高校，香港科技大学将无人自动化技术与机器人研究作为该校五大战略发展方向之一，机器人研究院的研究方向包括自主系统与机器人、制造自动化与智能工厂、人与机器人交互，以及智能家庭和智能城市。ADI是全球领先的高性能模拟、混合信号和数字信号处理的半导体设计、制造厂商，专注于高性能模拟技术创新，特别是高性能传感器、数据转换器、放大器、数字处理器、射频与微波IC以及电源管理技术，持续帮助中国企业和高校更快速、更高质量地实现包括机器人在内的无人自动化应用的科技创新。
ADI全球大学计划总监Zoran
Zvonar表示：“机器人是全球产业应用和科研的热点，也是‘中国制造2025’的重要组成部分。ADI作为一家以创新为核心文化的企业，一直积极参与其中并致力于提供卓越的模拟技术。香港科技大学有非常好的科研基础，培养了大量科技人才。与香港科技大学机器人研究院的深入合作，在机器人领域共同寻求突破性发展，是ADI助力粤港澳大湾区创新建设的一个美好开端。”
香港科技大学机器人研究院院长王煜表示：“香港科技大学机器人研究院与ADI以往就拥有良好的合作关系，现在通过签署校企合作项目协议将进一步拓展合作深度与广度。借助ADI在高性能、高可靠性信号处理、传感技术等领域的国际领先优势，帮助香港科技大学机器人研究院在机器人应用以及相关教学、科研上实现更大的发展。”
香港科技大学机器人研究院的目标在于围绕粤港澳，特别是深圳和东莞等地的电子制造企业的需求进行针对性技术研发，该地区上千家电子制造厂对工业机器人有大量的需求。ADI高性能模拟技术将拓展在包括机器人在内的更多科研上，探索超越一切可能的新契机。
关于ADI公司
Analog Devices (Nasdaq:
ADI)是全球领先的高性能模拟技术公司，致力于解决最艰巨的工程设计挑战。凭借杰出的检测、测量、电源、连接和解译技术，搭建连接现实世界和数字世界的智能化桥梁，从而帮助客户重新认识周围的世界。详情请浏览ADI官网http://www.analog.com/cn

ADI Signs Agreement of Cooperation with School of Robotics with Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology Robotics Enhances Innovation and Development in Tai Wan District of Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan PR Newswire
Beijing, January 15, 2018
BEIJING, January 15, 2018 / PRNewswire / - Analog Devices,

Inc. (http://www.analog.com/en/index.html) (ADI) today announced the official signing of the Industrial Partnership Program (IPP) with Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. The two sides will actively cooperate in seeking technological breakthroughs and help boost the construction and development of the Bay Area of ​​Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macau and Hong Kong in support of China's national policy of accelerating the building of an innovative nation. Analog
Devices, Inc.

(ADI) today announced the official signing of the Industrial Partnership Program (IPP) with the Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. The two sides will actively cooperate in seeking technological breakthroughs and help boost the construction and development of the Bay Area of ​​Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macau and Hong Kong in support of China's national policy of accelerating the building of an innovative nation. As a world-renowned university based in Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology will be unmanned automation technology and robotics as one of the five strategic development direction of the school, Institute of robotics research, including autonomous systems and robots, manufacturing automation and intelligence Factory, human-robot interaction, smart home and smart city. Analog Devices is a leading designer and manufacturer of high-performance analog, mixed-signal and digital signal processing semiconductors in the world, specializing in high-performance analog technology innovations, specifically high performance sensors, data converters, amplifiers, digital processors, RF and microwave ICs As well as power management technology, continue to help Chinese enterprises and universities faster, higher quality unmanned automation applications, including robots, including scientific and technological innovation.
Zoran, Program Director, ADI Global University

Zvonar said: ""Robots are a global industrial application and research hotspot, and are also an important part of Made in China 2025. ADI has always been an innovation-centric enterprise and is committed to providing superior simulation technology."" Hong Kong Science and Technology University has a very good foundation for scientific research, training a large number of scientific and technological personnel with the Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in-depth cooperation in the field of robot jointly seek breakthrough development is ADI help Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macao Bay Area a good start for innovation and construction. ""

Wang Yu, dean of the Robotics Research Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology said: ""The Institute of Robotics of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology has had a good relationship with ADI in the past and will further expand the depth and breadth of the cooperation by signing the agreement on the university-industry cooperation project. With ADI's high- , High-reliability signal processing, sensing technology and other areas of the international leading edge to help Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in robotics and related teaching, research and development to achieve greater development.

Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology aims to develop targeted technologies around the needs of electronics manufacturing enterprises in Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macao, especially in Shenzhen and Dongguan. Thousands of electronics factories in the region have a large demand for industrial robots. ADI high-performance simulation technology will be expanded to include more robotics, including more research, to explore beyond all possible new opportunities.
About ADI Corporation
Analog Devices (Nasdaq:

ADI) is the world's leading high-performance analog technology company dedicated to solving the toughest engineering design challenges. With outstanding detection, measurement, power, connectivity and interpretation technologies, we build intelligent bridges connecting the real world with the digital world, helping customers to re-recognize the world around them. For more information, please visit the ADI website http://www.analog.com/cn

步冲关３４５０点难度不断加大，预计沪指强势整固在即。

行仍在于内在热点的转变，结构性行情会在大中小市值品种的分化表现进一步加剧。一方面，短
线资金对超跌补涨的参与，决定业绩超预期的白马股是否具有延续性机会，另一方面，题材股渡
过拉升期后的分化调整势在必行，这对于市场运行和个股震荡易形成不稳因素。
