久邦GOMO三个转型背后的中国移动互联网发展史
PR Newswire
广州, 2018年1月15日电
广州2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --

2017年，手机终端的数量在全球范围内已经超过了电脑终端。移动互联网也基于手机终端的普及和通信技术的迭代蓬勃发展起来。在中国移动互联网发展的历史中，久邦GOMO是一家绕不开的企业。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。从收费到免费、从塞班到安卓、从国内到国外的战略转型，在一次次成就久邦GOMO的同时，也引领着中国移动互联网的发展。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。模式转型：从收费到免费
在2004年3G门户出现之前，中国手机上网主要通过通信运营商，这会产生一定的费用。移动端便于携带，可以随时随地获取信息，但人们希望通过手机获取信息的需求和昂贵的上网门槛产生了冲突。
当时，久邦GOMO的创始人邓裕强嗅到了移动互联网中免费的先机，率先开创了国内首个免费的WAP网站
--3G门户，从此引领移动互联网走上免费模式的道路。从收费到免费，意味着移动互联网更加贴合自身的属性，意味着手机用户在随时随地获取免费的信息的同时，商业模式也随之改变。
免费的信息获取并不代表信息本身不具备价值，而是信息通过更广泛的传播获取收益。当在手机上获取信息越来越便捷的时候，用户数和使用粘性会不断提高，流量越多的地方，广告价值越高，成为连接买方与卖方的新桥梁。
3G门户运用其大量用户来进行移动互联网商业模式的探索，率先在移动互联网广告中获取收益。从收费到免费的模式转变，成就了早期的久邦GOMO。
平台转型：从塞班到安卓
在3G门户作为移动互联网入口之一取得巨大成功之时，久邦GOMO已经开始研发另外的手机流量入口
--基于塞班平台的“手机心脏”。2008年，久邦GOMO的领导人邓裕强带领团队研发“手机心脏”已经有一年多，“手机心脏”是一款集桌面美化、天气预报、智能IP拨号和网络浏览器于一集的多功能软件。
当项目已经初步成型的时候，安卓来了。谷歌2008年10月发布了第一款安卓手机。安卓系统自身所具备的开放性能够兼容各式各样的移动硬件，在安卓平台上软件开发的方便自由，让久邦GOMO意识到，这将是移动互联网的未来。于是高层立即做出决策，放弃塞班，转向安卓。但这也意味着，团队一百多人努力了一年多的结果喊停。据久邦GOMO总裁朱志描述：“
当时很多人哭了。但裕强对趋势的判断非常准确，面对大家的压力，裕强很坚定。”
几个月后，久邦GOMO研发的GO桌面、GO输入法、GO短信等一系列GO产品发布，席卷全球总榜。伴随着手机终端的不断普及和通信技术的不断迭代，安卓在全球的市场份额逐渐取代了塞班。
放弃塞班，转向安卓，这个基于移动互联网趋势精准判断下的取舍，再次成就了久邦GOMO。
战场转型：从国内到国外
平台转型之后，久邦GOMO逐渐从门户业务转向移动互联网的APP业务。
移动互联网迅猛发展，使得百度、阿里、腾讯这三大互联网公司也逐渐进入到移动互联网领域，三足鼎立的局面逐渐形成。随着时间的推移，中国的移动互联网人口红利减弱，市场也逐渐稳定饱和。但是，国外的移动互联网仍是一片蓝海。相对国内用户而言，海外用户有着比较良好的软件使用付费习惯，对于在免费的应用中植入广告的形式接受程度也较高。
移动工具类产品成为第一个攻占点。久邦GOMO以其工具产品中个性化的主题、皮肤，轻便快速启动的桌面、相机等应用迅速抢占了海外手机工具应用市场。
久邦GOMO目前拥有超过三十款的APP在海外安卓平台发布，旗下应用中的主题、皮肤出售，以及在流量大的基础上进行的广告发行，第三次成就了久邦GOMO，也奠定其移动互联网出海领导者的地位，制造了一定的移动互联网出海壁垒。久邦GOMO是最早进行移动互联网出海的企业，也是第一个在纳斯达克上市的中国移动互联网企业。
如今，越来越多的中国移动互联网企把目光转向海外，工具类产品的竞争也日趋激烈。2017年，久邦GOMO在海外工具市场成熟的情况下，战略布局了游戏、以及内容（直播GOLive、短视频Viedo
Me、新闻资讯BuzzHunt等）业务，将再次寻求移动互联网的转型。
久邦GOMO官方网址：www.gomo.com

The long history of GOMO behind the three transformations of China Mobile Limited Internet history
PR Newswire
Guangzhou, January 15, 2018
Guangzhou, January 15, 2018 / PRNewswire / -

In 2017, the number of mobile terminals in the world has exceeded the computer terminal. Mobile Internet is also booming based on the popularity of mobile terminals and the iteration of communication technologies. In the history of the Internet development of China Mobile Limited, the long-awaited GOMO is a company that can not be turned around. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. From charging to freeing, the strategic transformation from Saipan to Android and from home to foreign countries led the development of the China Mobile Limited Internet while implementing the GOMO for a long time. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. Model transformation: from free to free

Prior to the emergence of the 3G portal in 2004, China's mobile Internet access was mainly through the telecommunications carriers, which incurred a certain fee. The mobile is easy to carry and has access to information anytime, anywhere, but people want the conflict between the need to access information via their mobile phones and the expensive Internet access threshold.
At that time, the founder of long-state GOMO Deng Yuqiang smelled free mobile Internet initiative, pioneered the first free WAP site in China

- 3G portal, from leading the mobile Internet on the road to free mode. From charging to free means that the mobile Internet is more fitting with its own attributes, which means that while mobile users get free information anytime, anywhere, the business model also changes.

Free access to information does not mean that the information itself does not have the value, but rather through a wider dissemination of information for revenue. When getting information on mobile phones more and more convenient, the number of users and the use of viscosity will continue to increase, the more traffic, the higher the value of advertising, as buyers and sellers to connect the new bridge.

3G portal to use its large number of users to explore the business model of mobile Internet, the first mobile Internet advertising for income. From charges to free mode change, the achievements of the early long Bang GOMO.
Platform Transformation: From Symbian to Android
When the 3G portal was a huge success as one of the mobile Internet portals, the long-awaited GOMO has started to develop additional handset traffic entrances

- ""Cell Phone Heart"" based on Symbian platform. In 2008, a long time ago, the leader of the GOMO leader Deng Yuqiang led the team to develop the ""mobile phone heart"" which is a multi-functional software that integrates desktop beautification, weather forecasting, intelligent IP dialing and web browser .

When the project has been initially formed, Andrews came. Google released the first Android phone in October 2008. Android system itself has the openness to be compatible with a wide range of mobile hardware, software development on the Android platform, free and easy, so long Bang state GOMO realize that this will be the future of the mobile Internet. So senior immediate decision-making, to give up Saipan, turned to Andrews. But that also means that more than a hundred people in the team worked hard for more than a year to halt their results. According to Zhu Zhi, president of GOMO for a long time, ""
Many people were crying at that time. However, Yu Qiang's judgment on the trend is very accurate. In the face of everyone's pressure, Yu Qiang is very firm. ""

A few months later, GOBO Bang GOMO developed GO desktop, GO input method, GO SMS and a series of GO products released, sweeping the world total list. With the continuous popularization of mobile terminals and the continuous iteration of communication technologies, Android gradually replaced Saipan in the global market share.
Abandoned Saipan, turned to Andrews, this based on the precise judgments of the trend of mobile Internet trade-offs, once again achieved the long-Bang GOMO.
Battlefield transition: from home to abroad
After the platform transformation, the long-Bang GOMO gradually shifted from the portal business to the mobile Internet APP business.

Rapid development of mobile Internet, making Baidu, Ali, Tencent Holdings Limited these three Internet companies have gradually entered the field of mobile Internet, the three pillars of the gradual formation of the situation. With the passage of time, China's mobile Internet demographic dividend weakened, and the market also gradually stabilized and saturated. However, the overseas mobile Internet is still a blue ocean. Compared with domestic users, overseas users have relatively good paying habits of software usage, and are also more accepting of the form of advertisement embedded in free applications.

Mobile tools products become the first capture point. Jubang GOMO quickly seized the market for mobile handset applications overseas with its personalized themes in its tool products, skins, lightweight quick-start desktops and cameras.

Jubang GOMO currently has more than thirty models of APP released in the overseas Android platform, its application theme, the sale of the skin, as well as the flow of large-scale advertising, the third achievement of the long state GOMO, also laid Mobile Internet leader in the sea to the status of mobile Internet to create a certain barrier to the sea. The long-established GOMO is the earliest mobile internet company and the first China Mobile Limited internet company listed on NASDAQ.

Nowadays, more and more China Mobile Limited Internet companies turn their attention overseas, and the competition for tool products is getting fiercer. In 2017, Jubang GOMO strategic layout of the game in the overseas tool market, as well as the content (live GOLive, short video Viedo
Me, BuzzHunt, etc.) business, will once again seek the transformation of the mobile Internet.
Goodbang GOMO official website: www.gomo.com
